comments: It was very promising game. New update turns game very very hard and unbalanced. To much equipment cost for too little kill reward. Already spent money. But now without real money it is so difficult. No fighting chance at all. Please fix it

This COULD be a great game, but it's a very much unbalanced. Your resources on you area NEVER grow back, so you must travel... I get why that is, but it takes 10-30 minutes, unless of course you want to use energy. You get 100 energy and it takes too much energy to fast travel at the pace that energy is replenished. If you can get around that, and build a few items, tools, weapons, etc. It seems like the game finally gets going but if you die from the 5-10 attackers, you lose ALL of your stuff on you. Everything I've mentioned can of course be fixed by spending a TON of money, but beware, everything has durabilty, and once broken will disappear. So you will always be spending money. CAN'T THERE BE ONE OF THESE GAMES THAT AREN'T MADE OUT OF COMPLETE GREED?
Great game, wish there was something to gain more energy, and a hp, or energy lvl cap off, max hp should go up like 2hp per lvl gained. Idk more stats that the player can tweak for gameplay
I really like it, but such a slow start, after the initial offering of goodies i just stumble along with constant death, no weapon, lose my bag every death. Very frustrating.
The team solved all my issues. Beautiful game, new twist on an already good concept. Loving it! Can't stop! Addicted!

I still like the formula (except for the energy, I want to play not wait), but... If you're just going to clone Last Day, you could at least include the character customization and female model. We waited forever for that in LDoE to the point where I quit playing it as Generic Dude and never really got to enjoy it as I would've preferred playing my own gender. Trying to call it an RPG when you have zero customization. While I absolutely love that there's no stupid 24hr horde breaking walls like in LDoE, the Night Guest is also annoying, fast and without warning. The game balancing is a little on the tough side, and if you're going to keep it that way, you could at least make the AI stop camping the border where we ran out of a zone. The spawning-in AI that beeline chases you down happens too frequently, and some enemies keep camping the area if you run to the border. Makes it tough when they're hitting you the moment you try to return. Also, AI "players" spawning and 1-2shotting me out of nowhere with a bastard sword? I'd love new content, but game needs balancing.
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!● EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.● LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.● DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!● SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.● OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.● BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.● JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.● RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.● SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

description: Bubble Witch 3 Saga – A magical bubble shooting puzzle game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga.The newest game in the popular Bubble Witch series. Stella the Witch is back and she needs your help to defeat Wilbur in this exciting puzzle blasting adventure! Wilbur may look cute, but he's full of magical mischief! Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game.Help Stella, Nero and Violet restore piece to the realm by matching bubbles with the unique aiming line that allows you and Stella to blast and pop with magical precision! Solve the puzzles to reunite the ghosts, save the owls and rescue the important fairy queen in this explosive bubble shooting adventure. Cast spells and power ups with Nero and blast your way through those extra tough levels to keep up with the mischievous Wilbur!Blast! Stella needs to rebuild her home all thanks to the evil Wilbur. Take aim and pop your way through the levels to find the magic star dust Stella needs in order to rebuild, customize and style her new home!The only bubble shooter you will ever need! Take on this magical Saga alone or pop with friends, burst their bubble by setting an all new high-score.Bubble Witch 3 Saga features: • Match 3 bubbles to pop them in this magical puzzle shooting adventure • Spellbinding game modes and cute characters!• Release the owls, free the ghosts and save the Fairy Queen from Wilbur!• Rebuild Stella’s house and visit your friends to get rewards • Special boosters to help you pass those tricky levels• Easily sync the game between devices when connected to the Internet• Leader boards to watch your friends and competitors!• A free & easy to play bubble shooter, challenging to master! • Available to play on Android phone and tablet devicesBubble Witch 3 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!Follow us to get news and updates:https://www.facebook.com/bubblewitch3sagahttp://www.youtube.com/c/Bubble_Witchhttps://www.instagram.com/bubblewitchsagaofficial/http://www.twitter.com/Bubble_WitchStart the bubble bursting experience today!Have fun playing Bubble Witch 3 Saga!
descriptionHTML:
Bubble Witch 3 Saga – A magical bubble shooting puzzle game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga.

The newest game in the popular Bubble Witch series. Stella the Witch is back and she needs your help to defeat Wilbur in this exciting puzzle blasting adventure! Wilbur may look cute, but he's full of magical mischief! Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game.

Help Stella, Nero and Violet restore piece to the realm by matching bubbles with the unique aiming line that allows you and Stella to blast and pop with magical precision! Solve the puzzles to reunite the ghosts, save the owls and rescue the important fairy queen in this explosive bubble shooting adventure. Cast spells and power ups with Nero and blast your way through those extra tough levels to keep up with the mischievous Wilbur!

Blast! Stella needs to rebuild her home all thanks to the evil Wilbur. Take aim and pop your way through the levels to find the magic star dust Stella needs in order to rebuild, customize and style her new home!

The only bubble shooter you will ever need! Take on this magical Saga alone or pop with friends, burst their bubble by setting an all new high-score.

Bubble Witch 3 Saga features:
• Match 3 bubbles to pop them in this magical puzzle shooting adventure
• Spellbinding game modes and cute characters!
• Release the owls, free the ghosts and save the Fairy Queen from Wilbur!
• Rebuild Stella’s house and visit your friends to get rewards
• Special boosters to help you pass those tricky levels
• Easily sync the game between devices when connected to the Internet
• Leader boards to watch your friends and competitors!
• A free & easy to play bubble shooter, challenging to master!
• Available to play on Android phone and tablet devices

Bubble Witch 3 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.
You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

description: ====================================삼국지의 정통성, 삼국지 책략전이 잇는다!난세의 영웅이 되어 천하를 평정하고 최고의 영웅이 되라!삼국지 책략전====================================■■게임특징■■1. 싱글 플레이를 통해 천하통일 및 역사이벤트를 통해 최고의 장수를 등용하라!2. 등용한 장수로 일기토 대전(PVP)에서 탑 랭커가 되어 최강의 아이템을 획득하라!3. 유저들 간의 협동을 통하여 삼국지 천하를 내 손안에! ▶싱글 플레이- 내 꿈은 천하통일! 천하통일을 목표로 시대와 군주를 선택 가능- 자동화된 전투시스템 및 개별 부대 컨트롤 가능 - 어떤 장수라도 다 있다! 다양하고 개성 강한 534명의 장수- 대 역사의 서사시! 24개의 역사 이벤트와 13개의 일반 이벤트- 내일도 할거야~ 저장 및 로드 시스템▶멀티 플레이 (일기토 대전)- 누구의 장수가 강한지 겨루어보자! 176명의 PVP 장수들- 남들보다 강해지고 싶다! 아이템 강화 시스템- 더욱 특별한 각 장수 별 ★특별★ 능력치 부여- 방심은 금물! 유저들간의 뺏고 뺏기는 명예제도▶멀티 플레이 (천하제패)- 세력을 생성 또는 세력에 가입하여 천하를 호령할 세력을 키워라!- 세력원간에 협동하여 천하제패를 이루고 더 강력한 아이템을 획득하라!* 삼국지 책략전은 원활한 게임 플레이를 위해 아래의 권한을 필요로 하고있습니다.- 기기 ID 및 통화 정보 : [필수] 기기 식별을 위한 권한- 기기 및 앱 기록 : [필수] 게임 데이터 저장을 위한 권한* 접근권한 철회방법 - 운영체제 6.0 이상 : 설정 > 어플리케이션 관리자 > 앱 선택 > 권한 > 접근권한 철회 가능 - 운영체제 6.0 미만 : 접근권한 철회가 불가능하므로, 앱 삭제로 철회 가능☞주의☜이 게임은 게임상에서의 아이템구매에 있어 In App Billing 을 통한 결제가 이루어질 수 있습니다.('전자상거래 등에서의 소비자 보호에 관한 법률'에 따라 청약철회가 제한될 수 있으며 상세 문의는 하이브로 고객센터 메일: support@highbrow-inc.com로 문의 부탁 드립니다.)(게임 문의는 아이디, 닉네임, 휴대폰 기종을 기재하여 sam@highbrow-inc.com으로 메일 부탁드립니다.)삼국지 책략전 커뮤니티: http://cafe.naver.com/samtactic제작사 홈페이지: http://www.highbrow-inc.com----개발자 연락처 :02-538-1462

comments: Cool game and graphics. The help function for explaining gameplay is vague. Everything costs alot of rss to build once you hit level 16 and higher. Game packs are way too expensive, and like every other game as this, Its mostly pay to win. I'll be most likely deleting it soon because it will take a month to save up enough cash to upgrade a thing else. Next game will be...
Great game, always adding updates. Maybe you guys can add some ai bases so we don't always have to attack weak players that are trying to develop. Add the extra PvE element.

Fun and addictive game but has a lot of bugs still and the devs are very slow to respond. Had my troops stuck and unusable for 2 days now with NO dev response as yet. Could be a great game if they get the bugs fixed, remove some of the pay to win aspects and respond to the players better.
It's a good game,  but the rapid production of resources  failing  most of the time. Developers must solve the problem,  then I will give 5 star rating
A strategy game we've seen a million times before, reskinned and tweaked for zombie genre
The game has improved with the new updates. Still a pay to win game though. Small alliances have no chance of surviving.

descriptionHTML:
Commander! They’re here…Battle is waiting

Join the struggle of players around the world in the zombie infested wasteland.

[Survive]
Build your defenses to fend off hordes of zombies while keeping your people fed.

[Build]
Fully customizable building mechanic to make your post-apocalypse shelter feels truly home

[Alliance]
Join together with survivors from different countries to flourish, where’s the fun if you can’t do war with your friends?

[War]
The world might have ended, but not war, bandits and other alliance all want what you have, defend your home with strategy.

[Take Over the World]
Realistic massive multi-player gaming experience through socialization, making alliance, wage war on the enemies, and become the over-lord of the wasteland

After the dust settles, how will you rule?

description: Tào Tháo Truyện HD– game chiến thuật đa nền đã xuất hiện trên ios. Đây sẽ là tựa game chiến thuật đề tài Tam Quốc  hấp dẫn nhất từ trước đến nay mà bạn được trải nghiệm trên hệ điều hành iOS Là một game mobile nhưng lại chơi được trên đa nền tảng, Tào Tháo Truyện hỗ trợ toàn bộ các thiêt bị từ mobile với bộ cài java, tablet, các điện thoại cao cấp chạy hệ điều hành với bộ cài được hỗ trợ tối đa về đồ họa mang đến những hình ảnh thực sự đáng kinh ngạc. Đến nay Tào Tháo Truyện hỗ trợ thêm bộ cài cho các thiết bị chạy hệ điều hành ios càng làm tăng thêm sức mạnh vốn có của game mobile chiến thuật duy nhất tại Việt Nam. Tào Tháo Truyện có sức hút không hề nhỏ bởi những đặc điểm và tính năng tuyệt vời!Map rộng lớn, có sức chứa lên tới hàng nghìn thành trì, các anh hùng có thể thoải mái đánh chiếm tính toán  chiến thuật hợp lý ở mỗi lãnh thổ. Thành trì được liên kết với nhau với các tuyến đường để hành quân. Tận dụng được các tuyến đường huyết mạch và nắm bắt được địa đồ cũng là một trong những chiến thuật tối quan trọng để chiến thắngNhững trận chiến diễn ra với cả nghìn vạn quân trong một chiến trường thời gian thực. Các bạn có thể trải nghiệm một cảm giác rất “ Tam Quốc” mà không một game nào có thể mang lại được .Có đầy đủ các thần tướng dũng mãnh của thời chiến quốc để bạn thu phục, các danh tướng này chỉ có thể có được thông qua việc tấn công thành trì địch quốc bắt về và chiêu hàng và mỗi danh tướng là duy nhất trong cả cõi tam quốc, cả một chặng đường gian nan nhưng khi sở hữu một trong các danh tướng thì bạn cũng có thể đã vang danh thiên hạ rồi.Sau những trận chiến trường kỳ , bạn có thể về thành của mình nghĩ ngơi mình trong những cảnh đẹp phong thủy hữu tình, toàn cảnh trong thành như một bức tranh thủy mặcThế giới Tam quốc và huyền thoại của những vị thần tướng đang chờ bạn khám phá, hãy tham gia và cảm nhận.Tào Tháo Truyện sẽ chính thức trở thành game chiến thuật trên iOS hot nhất năm 2017!Fanpage : https://www.facebook.com/taothaotruyenhd/Group     : https://www.facebook.com/groups/615451751946882/
descriptionHTML:
Tào Tháo Truyện HD– game chiến thuật đa nền đã xuất hiện trên ios. Đây sẽ là tựa game chiến thuật đề tài Tam Quốc hấp dẫn nhất từ trước đến nay mà bạn được trải nghiệm trên hệ điều hành iOS
Là một game mobile nhưng lại chơi được trên đa nền tảng, Tào Tháo Truyện hỗ trợ toàn bộ các thiêt bị từ mobile với bộ cài java, tablet, các điện thoại cao cấp chạy hệ điều hành với bộ cài được hỗ trợ tối đa về đồ họa mang đến những hình ảnh thực sự đáng kinh ngạc. Đến nay Tào Tháo Truyện hỗ trợ thêm bộ cài cho các thiết bị chạy hệ điều hành ios càng làm tăng thêm sức mạnh vốn có của game mobile chiến thuật duy nhất tại Việt Nam.
Tào Tháo Truyện có sức hút không hề nhỏ bởi những đặc điểm và tính năng tuyệt vời!
Map rộng lớn, có sức chứa lên tới hàng nghìn thành trì, các anh hùng có thể thoải mái đánh chiếm tính toán chiến thuật hợp lý ở mỗi lãnh thổ. Thành trì được liên kết với nhau với các tuyến đường để hành quân. Tận dụng được các tuyến đường huyết mạch và nắm bắt được địa đồ cũng là một trong những chiến thuật tối quan trọng để chiến thắng
Những trận chiến diễn ra với cả nghìn vạn quân trong một chiến trường thời gian thực. Các bạn có thể trải nghiệm một cảm giác rất “ Tam Quốc” mà không một game nào có thể mang lại được .Có đầy đủ các thần tướng dũng mãnh của thời chiến quốc để bạn thu phục, các danh tướng này chỉ có thể có được thông qua việc tấn công thành trì địch quốc bắt về và chiêu hàng và mỗi danh tướng là duy nhất trong cả cõi tam quốc, cả một chặng đường gian nan nhưng khi sở hữu một trong các danh tướng thì bạn cũng có thể đã vang danh thiên hạ rồi.
Sau những trận chiến trường kỳ , bạn có thể về thành của mình nghĩ ngơi mình trong những cảnh đẹp phong thủy hữu tình, toàn cảnh trong thành như một bức tranh thủy mặc
Thế giới Tam quốc và huyền thoại của những vị thần tướng đang chờ bạn khám phá, hãy tham gia và cảm nhận.
Tào Tháo Truyện sẽ chính thức trở thành game chiến thuật trên iOS hot nhất năm 2017!

Fanpage : https://www.facebook.com/taothaotruyenhd/
Group : https://www.facebook.com/groups/615451751946882/

recentChanges: Phiên bản mới “ Mỹ Nhân Tam Quốc “
1、Tăng hệ thống totem( bảo vật) cho thành trì
2、Tăng hệ thống tháp pháo – tăng cường phòng thủ
3、Tối ưu hóa hệ thống trang bị cường hóa
4、Tăng thêm siêu cấp huyền thưởng lệnh-tăng khả năng bắt tướng, thêm tính năng mở nhiều , mở số lượng lớn.
5、Tăng thêm Nữ tướng siêu HOT như Lã Linh Khởi , Bào Tam Nương, Gia Cát Quả, Hoa Man v..v..
6、Tăng thêm nhiều trang bị mới – Trang bị Tôn Ngộ Không, Quân Vương v..v….
7、Tăng thêm Danh hiệu chiến đấu
8、Sửa bug

comments: I have a question. I have a tablet and a phone, i want to play on my phone with stuff that i have on my tablet. On tablet i am loged in with a google paly account, when i login to same account on my phone it doesnt ask me to download other chapters and i dont have any items or achivements. Is there any way to fix it or to make it work? PS: Its a realy good game, its my style. In MY OPINNION its batter than Shadow fight 3.

Not the master. But I had got with the achievement "thaught the teacher". After defeating hermit now I am used to magic. Only in few minutes I can earn money and upgrade​ my gear. Such a wonderful game it is. Even if the meter hangs to impossible I can beat the competitors. Very nice game used to play it often. At lesiure time I think spending​ in it is the best. As you can earn  daimonds  by just watching the ads.

The AI spam SO much! All they do is throw a suriken at you till you die. They won't even let you get up! 2 hits and I die yet I hit them like 10 times! There should be unlimited energy who wants to spend $20 for unlimited energy. Plus the controls are trash.

I love this game. I've never been good at fighting games like Tekken or soul Calibur but this game is a very simple take on the genre. I love how very martial arts based this game is and the hit boxes on the characters are quite accurate and simple to understand as well as the moves. Being a martial artsist my self this game has given me an outlet to mentally practice distance management, fake outs and strategy as well as practicing to be like water. The famous Bruce Lee saying. Love this game. Also the rank up system and the grinding isn't too over bearing or tedious and makes it fun through and through.

Great game, my only problem is that it took a long time grinding for the money you need to buy items. It took me about 5 hours of grinding just to upgrade each weapon/armor, 6 hours to buy new ones. Still a great game, loved the way it's in shadows, making it harder to tell who you are.

Game is awesome. But for past 2 days whenever i open the game, it closes after intro showing that unfortunately SF 2 has stopped. Pls do something as i dont want to uninstall it. Also I hv sent feedbacks 2 to 3 times but no reply or fixation. Do something about it.
description: The sequel to the famous Facebook smash hit with 40 million usersShadow Fight 2 is a nail-biting mix of RPG and classical Fighting. This game lets you equip your character with countless lethal weapons and rare armor sets, and features dozens of lifelike-animated Martial Arts techniques! Crush your enemies, humiliate demon bosses, and be the one to close the Gate of Shadows. Do you have what it takes to kick, punch, jump, and slash your way to victory? There’s only one way to find out.- Plunge into epic combat sequences, rendered in astonishingly lifelike detail by anall-new animation system.- Devastate your enemies with delightfully intuitive controls, thanks to an all-newfighting interface designed especially for touchscreens.- Journey through six different worlds full of menacing demons in this action-packed, adrenaline-fueled combat RPG with an immersive, intriguing storyline.- Customize your fighter with epic swords, nunchacku, armor suits, magical powers,and more.Shadow Fight 2. May the battle begin!

comments: I liked this game alot and i played it everyday. And there's one thing i noticed. This birth monster fable, his quite a good tank but i feel like he should be updated or something. I mean, his skills are good but poor in execution. His skills took too long to trigger. He would take too much damage before he trigger his skills.

I really like this game I've been grinding it everyday since the 2nd day it was out. The only thing that is really annoying is the fact that the 3rd and 4th skills are going to take years to max out. Like one lvl 4 monster for 1 little space? That's like 300 evolve spores for 1 space and over 1000 for 1 letter upgrade. That's like a joke in my opinion
Terrible customer service. Great game and I wanted to keep playing, but I lost my account due to a phone issue and it's been several days with no response even as a paying customer.

Actually i like it. The art-style, the gameplay. It was just that it is very annoying when you cant update or even play via Wi-Fi. It "is" a huge problem. Not all people have their internet on a reasonable price. And they do tend to update their app on Wi-Fi hotspot. It is a trouble and a bug. You gotta fix it. Other than it. It is a pretty good game. Cheerio

Compared to similar games, this is a lot more fair. You aren't at the mercy of RNG, with enough time you will own every monster in the game. The roster is pretty small, but balanced. It definitely deserves a try, though the racy tone and humor might rub some people the wrong way.
I would love for this game to be available on HTC one M8! Just got a new phone and I can't play this game on it. Lol. Have to use my old beat up phone.

Dear team, It's really a awesome game ever. I'm playing it since 2 years. Very addictive. But i request you to all, when we start a TEAM RACE many players join clans for playing team race n take efforts in team race for getting better reward but many of them team leaders kick players just before ending the team race n players won't receieve any reward for it. It was happened with me 2 times. So please do any update for those players who take much efforts in team war and then also they get nothing. Thanks

This game used to be 5 star. They've changed it where all team events are gem sucks. You have no chance of winning without using a considerable amount of gems. They've taken away most in game free ways to get gems, and to buy them is not worth it, they're very over priced. It's not a team event, it's a paid for event. If they change it and make it more fair for everyone I'll make a new rating.

It's a nice game with so many awesome monsters. I like it and it's my favourite game in this category. My suggestion is that if you can include an option to cancel ongoing breeding by giving gold or gems or without anything, it would have been better. The game has events that comes very frequently, it helps so much in getting new monsters and or progressing in the game.

The game is awesome! The game play, the monsters, and also the actual fighting and graphics. This is one of my most rated games and my most played; I couldn't go a day without it. It's competition is so good online with people and in dungeons and the map, also team wars are fun with your friends. Get this game you'll never regret it.

Better idea than other egg hatching games... LOSE THE FIFTEEN TO TWENTY ADVERTISEMENTS FOR THE DIFFERENT THINGS IN THE GAME AND MAYBE IT WOULD BE PLAYABLE... So many screens trying to pop up all at once that playability becomes null do to sever lag and lock ups.
description: Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates! Battle with the ultimate monster fighting force to lead them to victory in Monster Legends! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary monsters and turn them into beasts!Collect mighty monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in action packed battles. Build a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and fighting games full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Monster Master!If you’re all about multiplayer games, you’ll love Team Wars, where you’ll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop. Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players. Start building, collecting and battling today! Monster Legends is a beast of an action game! MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURESBREED & COLLECT – UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week! - Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!BATTLE LEGENDARY MONSTERS- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries.- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.STRATEGY-BASED RPG FIGHTING GAME- RPG progression to level up your monsters and power them up for the battles ahead.- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!- Set your monster teams strategically, combining  the attackers, tanks and effect monsters that work best together- Battle games will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!- Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode, earn trophies and climb up the leaderboards. The higher you are at the end of the season, the better your rewards!- Fight in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Leader! - The monsters in your Defense Team will need to be strong to protect your trophies from being stolen by other Monster Masters.- Team Wars are the ultimate Multiplayer Games: Join or start a team, build a strategy with other players and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop!- Team up with your friends, fight and measure your battle strategy and strength against other players.BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!- Build a Monster Paradise and fill it with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!- Unlock special spots in the islands, like the Library, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab!Are you brave and skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world? Find out with Monster Legends, the action RPG that will put you in charge of a monster empire! Download today and start training your monsters!Check Monster Legends out on:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegendsTwitter: https://twitter.com/Monster_LegendsYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/MonsterLegendsGameOther great titles by Social Point: Dragon City, World Chef and Dragon Land. Check them out!Monster Legends is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.If you love your monsters, make them smile. Drop us a nice review here!
descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time updates!

Battle with the ultimate monster fighting force to lead them to victory in Monster Legends! Breed, feed, raise and train Legendary monsters and turn them into beasts!

Collect mighty monsters to uncover unique skills and boost your strategy in action packed battles. Build a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats and breed new species! Take your monsters on exciting quests and fighting games full of strategy. Only then will you be able to prove yourself a Monster Master!

If you’re all about multiplayer games, you’ll love Team Wars, where you’ll be able to duel other Monster Masters and win magnificent rewards and War Coins you can use to collect the exclusive monsters in the Team Shop.

Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players. Start building, collecting and battling today! Monster Legends is a beast of an action game!

MONSTER LEGENDS FEATURES

BREED & COLLECT – UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT
- Collect over 400 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week!
- Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species!

BATTLE LEGENDARY MONSTERS
- Collect incredible monsters of all types in limited-time events!
- Fight in special events made of wonders and dangers packed with role playing action and unknown monster adversaries.
- Collect treasures and rewards in your quest to glory.

STRATEGY-BASED RPG FIGHTING GAME
- RPG progression to level up your monsters and power them up for the battles ahead.
- Your monsters will become stronger as you rank them up in the Monster Lab and equip them with runes!
- Set your monster teams strategically, combining the attackers, tanks and effect monsters that work best together
- Battle games will require strategy and tactics if you want to rise to the top of the rankings!

MULTIPLAYER BATTLES!
- Duel other Monster Masters in the PvP Mode, earn trophies and climb up the leaderboards. The higher you are at the end of the season, the better your rewards!
- Fight in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Legendary Leagues and become the Legendary Leader!
- The monsters in your Defense Team will need to be strong to protect your trophies from being stolen by other Monster Masters.
- Team Wars are the ultimate Multiplayer Games: Join or start a team, build a strategy with other players and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop!
- Team up with your friends, fight and measure your battle strategy and strength against other players.

BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!
- Build a Monster Paradise and fill it with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!
- Unlock special spots in the islands, like the Library, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab!

Are you brave and skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world? Find out with Monster Legends, the action RPG that will put you in charge of a monster empire!

Download today and start training your monsters!

Check Monster Legends out on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegends
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Monster_Legends
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/MonsterLegendsGame

Other great titles by Social Point: Dragon City, World Chef and Dragon Land. Check them out!

Monster Legends is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

If you love your monsters, make them smile. Drop us a nice review here!

Invasion is a war-themed MMO game that challenges you to conquer and battle your way to world domination in the midst of a global apocalypse.

✔Battle enemies in nail-biting RTS combat to rule the apocalypse!
✔Build and customize your base!

Fight to become the most powerful military commander in the world as you march your way to victory! Do you have what it takes to survive in this world at war?

comments: Fun and entertaining game, with easy class switching. Inventory space is an issue early game, but once you start getting daily challenges, you can use up trash drops after every level.  The controls could do with some work, but overall, still a well-made game.

Everything works so well and after level 11 there is so much to play that it do not feel right to complain but I will anyway. Every character has same face. Most of time it do not tough matter under all the clothes. I would have just wanted long white beard or something. Maybe later there is change for that too? I am still just on level 12.

I was in love with this game, until my game stopped saving. Game keeps telling me im not online. 15045816. Yes devs this review is for you. I have tried a multitude of work aroubds. Have you had trouble in the past with corrupted saves or syncing issues ?
Rpg simple yet nostalgic of old fantasy games like Diablo. Not overly time needy, but always something to do if you need a time waster.
Game is pretty good. I just wish instead of relying on gold and gems they should add a dragon gem you can earn in game to help upgrade your character for people who can't afford to use real money.

Awesome game. The only problem i have with it is the fact that my character is a level 20 and i still can't join a guild, which should be available at level 17.  Other then that it is just such a kick a$$ game i still have it all 5 stars.

descriptionHTML:
Heed the call of the magicians guild - conjurers, witches, archers and templars are needed! Monsters and dragons roam the realm, and your friends have already picked up the gauntlet, bow and arrow as well as sorcerer hats to raid dungeons, gain fame, and fight warlocks in the arena against other guilds!

Guild of Heroes delivers everything the classic fantasy has to offer, with devious dwarves and ancient elves, nasty orc shamans and troll sorcery, epic action and dark caves, quests and raids as befits the best medieval style RPG in the lineage of tabletop games.

However, the epic journey through the huge, colorful game world is not only fairy tales of mystic dungeons and dragons, but also battle against mages in the arena, controlled by other players!

In a nutshell:
★ Action-packed fantasy RPG in best game graphics
★ Equip character classes such as mage, hunter and warrior, interchangeable at any time
★ PVP against other teams in arena guild wars
★ Craft medieval weapons and armor with hundreds of combinations
★ Thousands of different monsters from diabolic exorcists to ... oh, discover for yourself!

Now, enough of the heroic ballads; grab your wand, sword and shield, and into the best, free fantasy RPG you'll ever experience!

Oh, do not forget: Follow the Guild of Heroes Community on Facebook - Events, Fan Art, Guild Friends and Contests are waiting to be explored!

comments: Well, the player attack and defense balance is off. The attack power wax and wanes so bad, you cant tell if your really improving your stats. The main imbalance is with the Mpds vs. Spds as well as the arena. You can have an attack of five hundered in Spd then 300 in Mpd. When you get to the arena its potatoe. Other than that its not that bad.
Greta game but there is one major issue with it cricket users cant sign in with crickets mobile data. Not sure why that is but i sure wish it would get fixed!
I was having a blast until I randomly went from lvl20 to lvl53, which is when hell broke loose to the point where I can't even load the game anymore. It crashes now...15 bucks I will never get back

Pvp needs some work the arena matching isn't fair at all because you don't get matched with people within your level range you could be level 22 and still get matched with someone who's level 80 and new classes wouldn't hurt either I would love to see a plate healer like a cleric or paladin other then that the games great
Each time I try to load the game now it crashes as the gaea logo makes noise. Please fix this asap. I love the game otherwise
Don't play this game if you like pvp. You'll be matched with people 3x your br or more every single time. Most trash matchmaking system of any game ever...

comments: Good graphics and social contents. 2nd update. Now I played for at least 3 months and pretty high rank 64 in the server.  I found 2 major flaw.    Drop rate for nat5 vs nat4 is so huge that I get 10x dupe of each nat4 before I can pull 1 nat5 and usually from mileage and even that I get dupe.  Legendary gear drop rate keeps getting needed it feels.  The content get repetitive but quick instant battle helps alot

Another game that tries to make it so difficult to progress. Each toon has four variants that corresponds to each element. You have to evolve, upgrade, and awaken each independently. The mats for star evolving and awakening are hard to get.  As vip 8 already after maxing with all my mats it's slow getting more.  Another cash game that for some reason has high rating. F2p players prepare to grind monthly to upgrade one toon. After level 20 the progress is steep!!!

This game was amazing! While I was looking for something to play based of an MMORPG gamed base structure I found this! I loved the was the tutorial and how its shown me most of the tactics. I also love the level up system is pure genius.  In other games super easy to level up, but in this one it's harder to level up giving the player a chance to have fun. I highly recommend this game.

Very little originality both in design and monetization/progression systems, as to be expected in a mobile gacha game. But if you don't care about that, it'll give you plenty to do for awhile. Real rating is 4; only submitted as 5 because there's an in-game incentive (bribe) to do so.

Fully funny translations. Could be pay to win depending how hard and long you want to grind. Update: noticeable change to rng values on rolls. Story progression linked to account level. 2nd update: Game losing its rewarding factor. Not to say they do not give you anything. More on the lines of making thing out of reach. There definitely is a tamper in their program which makes things easy in the beginning then funnels progress to the point it goes beyond pay to play.

Constant server disconnections make it unplayable. Crazy pay 2 win. No strategy whatsoever and lazy autobattle from the beginning. Nonexistant story or character development. Awful English translation. Same characters multiplied by 4 to simulate false variety. And dishonestly gives rewards for 5 ☆ reviews.

descriptionHTML:
Featured by App Store China, the western fantasy 3D strategy turn-based RPG Final Contract: Legacy of War is coming!

Language available in game: English, Simplified Chinese, Thai.

[Game Intro]

Final Contract: Legacy of War is a western fantasy 3D turn-based strategy game with film-like CG and visuals. Packed with more than 200,000 words of original stories and historical settings, it can be called as ‘A playable and lively story book’.

Hundreds of spiritas to select, win battles with your strategy and wisdom!
Dazzling wings and exquisite costume, unique to none!
Innovative AR function, touch your fantasy spiritas in reality!
Real-time cross-sever PVP, fight anytime as you wish!


[Game Features]

1. Plenty of Collection & Cultivation
Over 100 spiritas with four elements attribute: Water, Fire, Earth and Wind.
17 types of career items for spiritas.
Plenty of wings and character costumes which may add to the stats of your spiritas.
All the things are to be collected by you!

2. Rich in Strategy, Unlimited Combination!
Spiritas are divided into 4 elements and different fighting roles. There are totally 17 types of career gears. The varity of combinations of spiritas and gears make the battle style to a maximum. Win with strategy!
Attack or Defence, maximum critical damage or full armor, all decided by you!
Refusal to level suppression.
Create different group combination to battle different enemies by strategy!

3. Abundant Gameplay. PVE/PVP/GUILD system
Enjoy real-time battle PVP with players all over the world!
Fight for your own guild’s honor in Guild Battle and enjoy the rewards.
Challenge varity of difficult dungeons and Bosses for rare items.
To save time, you can also use sweep coupon. Let’s explore the Alien Gate, Dungeon, Eternal land and other PVE play methods to gain endless resources and items!

4. Rich Resources and Welfare
Gain epic spirita in the 2nd day and legendary spirita in the 7th day For FREE.
Free VIP rewards available for all players.
No joystick! At least one epic spirita is guaranteed in every ten summon.
Multiple ways to collect legendary spirita just by daily Quest.

5. A Lively Story Book to be Opened
With film-like CG and visuals, the game features more than 200,000 words of original story. It’s based on a grand world view and hundreds of spititas’ stories from the very beginning of the creation of the world by two Gods, to the era when balance broke up by the immoderate exploitation of element power. Contract war is about to break up among the Human, the Elf and the Cyborg.
The fate of the Artys city is tightly held by the contracter. Secrets inside the open designed main city is to be discovered by you.

6. Innovative AR Function
With 360° panorama free view, you can summon your spiritas to the reality, crossing the boundary between fantasy and reality and take photos with them!

Come and complete your spiritas book!

Contact us:

comments: Only smart peoples know how to rate any game app that they have never seen before, for the starter.. I just give you this 3* cause I am waiting for your surprise on 29th November.. I hope this game can satisfy my curiosity.. and.. if that happen, I will definitely give you 5* but if not.. maybe ill stay on 3* or less... can't wait for logging in 😁

The Auto-Play and auto-Combat is nice. But I wish I could control my "Companions" in battles. The Companions' AI is not good. Like healing when they only need 1 attack, attacking someone else. If you can't make them accessible to us. Atleast give us a "target-this-guy-only" button for AIs.   Thanks ^^

I really like the game... It's just that we need a place where we could have AFK and not just when it's in the task. And there is too much things on the screen like the benefits, I think there should be a button where you could temporarily hide those. But over-all it's a nice game to play

Great game ever for mmorpg .. Dont need a strong internet connection even players from bad wifi places could.. Fair diamond gift .. Just bit dissapointed with many server should create at least once a month quite better than once a week.. For all its very good game and should be play if you are really fan of mmorpg... vip could be strongest but free players also could do that as long you're active

I like the story of this game though. But I hate to say this. I am not a fan of VIP games. For only VIPs are stronger than those non-VIP. And the controls in battle, as if you were just watching your one and only character  to automatically playing. Servers are up, but this is why I don't like a game with too many servers. Man. It is boring if one of your friend is playing a different servers and when you both already pay on your own servers. It is too late to invite to your server. 😥

Overall, it's a good turn based rpg, the grephic is excelent, the story is also enjoyable, but please longer the duration of story chats, usually I can't finish reading them. And also there are some bugs, such as unable to mine crystal in cr, and ghost PM (these are the most annoying)

comments: I'm so addicted to this game! Out of all the simulation games I've played this is by far my favourite. The characters are great and the story line changes on each route so it keeps you interested. And you don't have to spend money to enjoy everything in this game. An hourglass takes a while to get but it's worth it to use them to get the extra stories. I enjoyed the Christmas add on.

Nice description, nice plot. Likable characters with spot on music. What more could I ask for? (Edit on 9/7: I downed the rating not because it's a bad game, but because although I had an account for this game, I lost all my data when I logged in. I had saved 270+ hourglasses so I could do the secret endings but well. That went down the toilet. I won't be trying again until I get interested (and over this) in this game again. Other than that I fully recommend this game.)

Loved it overall but make the chats last longer without having to reset them as I miss them with school or sleep. Not everyone can use the app at certain times in the day. It doesn't have to last the whole day just a few more hours  or 10. The games good other than that though. It's a good way to pass the time and has a good story.Keep up the good work.

Im in love wih the characters already! Though, its kinda sad that you are forced to be a girl character even if you state that you arent in game. That kinda took me out of the experience a bit. I understand it would probably take a lot of effort to put that option in, but man would it be cool. Keep up the great work!

I've been a long term fan now since 2016 when it came out and I still play it to this day! The chatrooms are very interesting to read and the visual novels are always something to look forward to! I have been in love with Saeran since the Common Route so him getting his own route was like a dream come true! Although, his route is an emotional roller coaster..

Update: I said that I only rated 4 stars because sometimes I missed the chat room because I didn't get any notification, right? But now, after I updated the game I get notifications about the chat, and not just once but twice! I got double notifications lol I'm so happy, thank you! And thanks for the 20 hourglasses after the update. Now I give you full 5 stars! I LOVE this game! 😘  I'd love to give 5 stars, I mean this game is amazing and almost perfect! Just sad that sometimes I missed the chat because I didn't get the notification. So, I have to check the game often. But I really enjoy playing this game, which doesn't feel like game at all. I feel like I'm chatting and talking with real people! And it says something, cause I just installed this yesterday. Highly recommended! Try it and you'll love it!

comments: WARNING: IF YOU DO NOT CORRECTLY SELECT POWERS BEFORE APPROVING, YOU LOSE THE POWER(S) YOU SHOULD HAVE RECEIVED! ALSO, DO NOT USE YOUR CRYSTAL SKULLS TO POWER UP, USE THEM TO EVOLVE! If you like One Piece, you'll like this game. The One Piece story line is faithfully adapted to the plot of the game (not exact, but great for a game story line). The characters are great. If you are patient and power up your characters, you don't have to pay to play. Basically no advertisement,  except for self promotion of the game.

Whether you are a fan of One Piece of not, this is an awesome game. Lots of fun, great and faithful art, and a rich combat. Best of all, they practically cram gems down your throat so you never feel forced to actually have to buy any.  An update to this is that I have been playing this game for years, so it is nice to see them keeping it fresh and fun. Still love this game. And as always, anni is the planni for my fellow Redditors.

This game is so fun collecting all the characters and trying to evolve them. Over the years I've had multiple phones so the only downside is the saving of data I wish it would just be connected to your account like most other games in case you lose or break your phone. Rather than having to start over is they can fix that issue this game is one of the best on the app store.

I have always loved onepeice and liked brave frontier very much so it's the best of both world's if you have ever beenm waiting for a one piece rpg then this is it. And grinding for items could of not been anymore fun than this. Still having fun with this game. And it's still getting better and better. Thank you for a perfect one-piece game. Also I normally hate grinding for items but when you live one piece like I do then it's doesn't matter. They also update the game with new content making it even better. 2018 and the game is still going strong.

Good for a One Piece fan! The many aspects of the game makes it interesting. There can be a bit of a learning curve for new players, but the slight challenge is what makes it fun. The updates and changes keep the game from becoming dull as well. Btw I have fun playing even as a free player because they are pretty generous with the game currency. You just need patience as with any game you play for free.

Game is fun overall. But get ready to grind after a week or so. Gems comes pretty easy overtime. But the prize in the store is a bit pricy especially when you are never guarantee the characters you want in the draw. So if you are not in a hurry. Save up your gems until they have a event with a guarantee 10th draw or something that has a character you want. Other than that, this game is great time killer and I love playing this game while waiting on the animation renew.

description: The most expecting MMORPG of 2017!“Zeon” is a greater classic MMORPG game ever with cute style which cost millions dollars to present. It had archived new milestone in mobile game industry by providing high definition gameplay, fascinating character skills and variety of interactive dungeon mode. To protect the land against Lord of Sin, we are seeking for brave warriors to join our alliance in battlefield. Let’s join our alliance and experience the thrilling and mysterious adventure together.[Game Characteristics]* New milestone in mobile game communityAs a mobile online game, “Zeon” had put much of effort into social communication. Friends system included intimacy, enemy and blacklist. From here, it was extended to couple, apprentice, team, guild, clan and other social community. Players who were staying far away from each other able to communicate immediately and most important you can make friends from all over the world. Besides, we had provided voice chat feature in game and it made the communication between players more convenient. * Hot Blooded PKIn “Zeon”, we have various kind of real time PK mode such as Colosseum, Royal War, Sin Battlefield, Camp war and so on. You can swap your dream pet anytime during the game because it will not influence your total CP at all. Other than common pet level up, you can boost the pet potential by using pets’ soul or giving favorite gift to pet.* New Interesting GameplayMost popular gameplay already released in our “Zeon”. In addition, we had created some special mode for players. It is such a great game worth a try.* Red Packets was Available Any recharge in this game will obtain a chance to gift red packet to everybody in the server. descriptionHTML:
The most expecting MMORPG of 2017!

“Zeon” is a greater classic MMORPG game ever with cute style which cost millions dollars to present. It had archived new milestone in mobile game industry by providing high definition gameplay, fascinating character skills and variety of interactive dungeon mode. To protect the land against Lord of Sin, we are seeking for brave warriors to join our alliance in battlefield. Let’s join our alliance and experience the thrilling and mysterious adventure together.

[Game Characteristics]
* New milestone in mobile game community
As a mobile online game, “Zeon” had put much of effort into social communication. Friends system included intimacy, enemy and blacklist. From here, it was extended to couple, apprentice, team, guild, clan and other social community. Players who were staying far away from each other able to communicate immediately and most important you can make friends from all over the world. Besides, we had provided voice chat feature in game and it made the communication between players more convenient.

* Hot Blooded PK
In “Zeon”, we have various kind of real time PK mode such as Colosseum, Royal War, Sin Battlefield, Camp war and so on. Are you excited with these activities? Let’s join us now!

* Creative Pet Cultivation
There are more than 10 types of pets in “Zeon”. Cute or cool pets are up to your choice. You can swap your dream pet anytime during the game because it will not influence your total CP at all. Other than common pet level up, you can boost the pet potential by using pets’ soul or giving favorite gift to pet.

* New Interesting Gameplay
Most popular gameplay already released in our “Zeon”. In addition, we had created some special mode for players. It is such a great game worth a try.

* Red Packets was Available
Any recharge in this game will obtain a chance to gift red packet to everybody in the server. This action is free of charge and will not consume any diamond or item. Do not miss this chance to grab it when you received the relevant announcement in the game.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you have any suggestion or problem, welcome to contact us.
Follow our Facebook fan page for more further news!
Facebook：www.facebook.com/eyouzeon
Instagram: eyougame_zeon
Email：zeon_support@eyougame.com
developerAddress: 05-06, Paya Lebar Square, 60 Paya Lebar Road, Singapore 409051
summary: Zeon-The most expecting MMORPG of 2017!
title: Zeon

comments: A well made app that's immersive, addictive, and the essence of the Kingdom Hearts franchise. The app is mission based and has a complex but easy to use medal system with rock-paper-scissors type of combat. You can join/make a party, or go solo. Money isn't an issue so long as you pace yourself. It gets better the more you play. There are optional event quests and a story, but don't fret if you can't get the app or just starting out; it's slow going. 735 quests.

Liking the cute art style but my god does this game take forever to download even with a low resolution. Has taken me two attempts and I'm doubtful that it's related to my broadband speed and connection (not sure if it's to do with my phone? But again, doubtful.) Would be great if this could be fixed somehow.

I freaking love this game! However I have a small complaint that is probably fixable. I was wondering for my lg g6 if you could expand the borders so the screen would fit. And if the screen is not able to get any bigger, I'm hoping you people can at least put a cool border around it instead of leaving it as a black bar. I know you people can make cool borders. Thanks for your attention!

Hey guys, huge fan of the kingdom hearts series and also the game in general. Though one thing I wish you could add is the option to link your data to your Google Play account as well as Facebook. Not a lot of us use Facebook so I wish there was more options to get your data back if you ever deleted the app. Otherwise, good game!

I love this game.  Strategy, adventure, and story (once you get far enough) are all great!  Although it is a little pay to win, and they keep coming out with new medals (attacks) that are infinitely better than your current ones.  This can get discurraging, because your hard work doesn't really mean much in the long run.    I played for 6 month when a friend got a single medal that made him more powerful than me on his 1st week playing.

[Edit: THANK YOU SO MUCH! I love that you all added a lower quality version this way I can play this game.] I like it and all, but when that very large download starts after the tutorial, it stops at 4/6 and restarts, even though my phone has enough room for it, I think. Please fix this, I really want to play it!

description: ■ 神將、猛將通通來！現在加入可享多種神將、猛將通通來活動。1) 神呂布：全遊戲最強的單體攻擊手。人中呂布、馬中赤兔。每個伺服器首七日的「戰力評比」中獲勝，即可以得到最強三國猛將呂小強。2) 蔡文姬：遊戲中唯二的補師之一。蔡邕之女，博學有才、精通音律。儲值送豪禮，參加活動即可獲得建安女詩人蔡琰。3) 趙雲：物理攻擊名將，常山趙子龍，一身是膽。轉盤返利活動，只要在活動時間內轉盤達一定次數，便可得到額外獎勵，有機會可以得到趙雲覺醒石。4) 小喬：吳郎中周瑜之妻，《三國志》曰「橋公兩女，皆國色也。」法術攻擊手。參加消費返利活動，在指定條件消費元寶即可獲得。5) 夏侯惇：曹操從兄弟，隻眼大將軍。物理攻擊。凡符合累計儲值活動資格，即可得到。■《惡搞三國》是什麼？《惡搞三國》遊戲採用全Unity製作，橫向全3D刀塔類ARPG手遊；故事描述時空亂流導致三國歷史變化，西元210年赤壁之戰中，諸葛亮錯借西風，孫、劉聯合大敗而逃，而主角也因為時空亂流，穿越時空回到此一時代。在生肖獸庚貓的協助下，為尋找輪回碎片，拯救三國歷史回到正軌，所展開的爆笑三國之旅。■雙技能即時戰鬥系統遊戲採用「雙技能即時戰鬥系統」，以ATB能量決定角色出招和動作，並配合每位角色的「必殺技－亂舞」和「覺醒技－無雙」一同左右戰場局勢。亂舞技能施放並無限制次數，只要CD（冷卻時間）一到，即可使用。同時配合怒氣表累積，還能施放左右戰局的無雙技。無論在PVE和PVP玩法中，決定角色陣型還有雙技能使用時間來中斷或防御敵方動作，則是戰鬥中的精妙所在。■「電影式劇情演出」配合「全語音系統」針對遊戲中過場故事，角色們都有特別的華麗演出，從臉部表情到出場搞笑台詞，都是精心設計而成，並大量採用真實配音製作，將帶給玩家更好的遊戲體驗。在美術風格上面，使用Q版3D角色設定，無論是耳熟能詳的劉備、曹操，或是小兵、機關，都是全3D卡通渲染製作。並結合歷史重現虎牢關、赤壁連環船等知名歷史場景。※本應用程式可供免費下載。※本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品等付費服務。※請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。※此遊戲需於網路連線環境下進行，可能會有第三方 (例如您的網際網路供應商或電信業者)向您收取數據傳輸或存取費用。※依《遊戲軟體分級管理辦法》，此軟體為輔12級，即十二歲以上始得使用。客服聯絡FB 粉絲頁 :https://www.facebook.com/egaosanguo/

description: 正統三國玩法，打造真正的SLG策略國戰手遊。無束縛7*24小時高自由國戰、舉國之力伏屍百萬皇城血戰、擊敗收服歷史名將、發展經營城池、真實還原三國歷史、清新細緻的古風畫面、熱血音樂，完美融合在遊戲之中。【遊戲特色】---內修其政，外禦強敵---從一座小城鎮開始經營你的城池，科技、農業、軍事都等待這你去建設去發展。你可以選擇優先科技提高生產力，也可以選擇優先軍事，發展武力。擊敗周圍的山賊，壯大你的城池。請注意，小心虎視眈眈的敵國鄰居。---歷史名將，臣服腳下---歷史名將，依次登場，需要你用武力征服他們。這不是常見的卡牌遊戲，武將需要靠“打”。魏蜀吳群雄上百武將等你征服，白藍綠金紅紫多種品質，武將是你征服世界的墊腳石。步兵、騎兵、弓兵，兵種輪回克制，打造你的強大軍團。好的武將需要好的裝備，赤兔馬，閃電槍，大將印封賞你的屬下。---登高一呼，劍鋒所指---遊戲分魏蜀吳三個國家陣營，一旦選擇，終生不改。國家設有一個國王、一個軍師、一個丞相、八大將軍等官職，不同官職擁有不同的戰事特權，官職由投票產生。組織你的軍隊、帶領你的國民，向敵國進軍吧，佔領敵國領土，搶佔敵國資源。---熱血or休閒，隨你掌握---就像遊戲裏的音樂戰場和田園一樣，遊戲裏你可以選擇做一個一將功成萬骨枯的將軍或者是一個悠然南山采菊東籬的隱者。做一只狼，搜尋獵物，偵查敵情，尋找時機，全力攻城，收穫戰利品。做一只羊，鞏固城防，發展科技，提示兵力，升級武將，保護好家園。---團結協作，同心同德---這是一款合作網遊，萬人激情線上，一個人的力量終究有限，團結在一起，什麼都不怕。結成狼群，侵佔敵國；或者抱團取暖，守望相助。除了遊戲，你將收穫充實的生活和友情。★最新動態★FB粉絲團：https://www.facebook.com/sanguogame※依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法, 此軟體為輔導十二歲級：十二歲以上之人始得使用。※本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品等付費服務。請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。請立即下載體驗！

descriptionHTML:
【Features】
- Join State War with Thousands of People
Fight against enemy state with your state members, carry out the amazing state war with thousands of players!

- Multiple Weapon Systems
Four kind of weapons, including long stick, bow, knuckles and twin blade, available for players. You can switch weapons freely during the fighting without the limited of classes.

- Summon Heroes from Three Worlds
Collect the animas, summon heroes, and upgrade the heroes to have your strongest heroes! And Summon them to assist in fighting!

- Various Combat Modes, Battle anytime anywhere
Act like God of War in 1v1 Arena, and slash with your fist in the Wild PK. Various PK modes are await. Just beat them up!

- Four Classes for Your Selection
Four classes, including Naughty Monkey, Dragon Lady, Bull Demon and Jade Fox can be selected. Each one has his merits and features. You can choose ranged or melee, attack or defense as you wish.

comments: Only reason im giving it 3 is because i cannot claim my reward fir my decour keeos telling me i need to exi build mode but there is no other way to claim the reward. Otherwise its such a fun and addictive game. Load time on certain items takes a bit longer also

I love the game! It's been a while since I haven't gotten bored of a game. This reminds me so much of restaurant city a few years back. Everything is well put together to keep you playing. I didn't even notice time passed by so quickly as I played! The only thing i wish was added is that you can send more things than just rubies to friends. I'd like to be able to send items to help our friends. Overall amazing game!!

I easily get bored with daily quests from other games, but I rated this 5 stars coz it has kept me hooked for 3 months straight, unusual thing for someone like me. Love the cute graphics, i get hungry with all the food. I love the other users with cat avatars and i love having them do part times for me. Definitely one to recommend. I get network errors, but its cool. Love how its constantly updated wih new and exciting things though i wish i could buy more rubies with real money, but i cant. Dont have real money. Leveling up is fair. Not too fast, not too slow. Just love it. Keep up the good work!

It is really a good game. I just have an issue with one of the quests for the Peter Pan episode, with Wendy to be more specific. I have already tapped the said character to hear her say "Is this love? " more than that was required, and yet it would not let me move forward to the next quest simply because it was not counting accurately. It was really irritating.

I love this game so much that i wanted to have another account. I've tried installing it on my computer using bluestacks but sadly,it doesn't open. There's a note saying use of third party apps trying to modify data is prohibited. Does it mean that the game is not supported in bluestacks? Please enlighten me. Thanks.

I'm on Level 31 and my i have my game saved on my google play. But when i installed it on my new phone, it doesn't sync my saved game data. It was already connected but there's nothing happen. But when i checked my achievements on google play games, all was there. I contacted the developer on GMail but until now there's no update on how will i retain my saved game data!

comments: The overall game is adorable! The gameplay is a load of fun, the graphics are amazing, and so are the animations. Just a few slight requests regarding certain aspects of Dance On Mobile: The game displays a trading system, although, when attempting to trade with another player, no items are able to be traded. Could you please fix this feature so that clothing items could be exchanged with other players?⭐ Thank you. ⭐

So the game looks really cute and fun. I let it download and stuff and waited for it to fully load. Then when it did it did some other loading which took forever since it was so slow since it used a lot of space. Then when I went to free up more it restarted and said I had to do the download loading page again and then it just froze.

I wanted to play it after seeing a gameplay on YouTube. It looks superior compared to Love Dance, it almost makes it look as if Love Dance was a copy of this game, but I am unsure which game was released first. I am unable to play this game because after the first launch, it donwloads the necessary files properly, but in the decompression step, at 5% it gives an error of "mistake". I tried it one more time, but had the same error. I would really like for this to be fixed because I am interested in playing this game with my girlfriend. In the meantime we'll continue with Love Dance...  My phone: Huawei Nexus 6P

Wth? I downloaded the game. Waited. After it was fully loaded I checked on it then it says "Dance on Mobile Has stopped" weird. I redid it everything and it asks me to free up my storage. I did then waited again. Then it says again "Dance on mobile has stopped". Don't know why it keeps happening. was really looking forward to playing it. 💁💁💁

I really love the game and it's quite interesting but I wish you could also put it in iOS because I have a friend which wanted to play this game but it's only available in play store and one of the problems of this game is that it crashes many times and it can lag really bad can you please make some of the diamonds cheaper? Another problem is the wheel of fortune, you should just use 1 ticket instead of 2 and I don't like the fact that your invitation code expires. Oh yeah, could you make the pm chat word capacity longer, it's hard explaining things when there are limitations in words and I can't open my game from time to time and it crashes so much too and please improce your english grammar and also, could you please make the nickname limit 15 instead of 12? I can't quite put the nickname I wanted and could you please fix the part where it lags so bad and I can't put the pictures on my profile and I still can't fix it plus, recently I can't open the game and has a lot of RTO and there so many problems but I still love the game~ I hope you improve the game please

This is a good game but i hate it everytime it updates these past few days since there are bugs. I can't update the latest files aswell and made me wait for days for them to fix it. I hope they fix it properly so we can always enjoy playing

description: Bored with typical MMO Strategy game play? Play War and Magic! Every action counts for battle victory.It’s time to show your strategic mind and capture the legendary honors in the most exciting REAL TIME MMO ACTION STRATEGY GAME! The well-designed battle system may challenge your strategic and tactical thinking. Command every action of your troops and every decision counts in the battles. Power is no longer the key to victory, but tactics and strategy.Ally with worldwide players and fight for the highest throne in this magic world. Build an empire with advanced technologies and structures. Protect your homeland and fight against enemies with legendary heroes and powerful troops. Support each other within the alliance and fight for the honors together. Only the winners from the clash could be commemorated as legends!FREE to play! Get it now! Real Time Tactics and Strategy- Improved game play for chessboard battlefield – every strategic action counts!- Strategically mix and match various heroes and soldiers for powerful troops. Build an Empire- Forge powerful equipment, level up your structures and technologies for greater power.- Real time resource management – maximize every bit of your resources and grow as fast as possible!- Look out for the enemies! Improve your defense ability and never let them succeed in plundering.- Participate in various daily competitions which could strengthen your empire power. Trigger an Online World War- Released worldwide in 8 languages. You could ALLY or FIGHT with other players worldwide in real time.- Attack your enemies and colonize the land! Also, be careful about improving your defense ability.- United we stand, divided we fall! Share troops and resources with alliance members to support and strengthen each other. Remember, you are not alone!- Battle for the throne! Conquer and defend the three world cities, struggling for the crown of the King. Explore the Magic World- 8 legendary heroes and 17 types of soldiers with unique skills and spells for you to choose from.- Seek exotic monsters in the extensive world map and captive them for your troops.- Visit relics covered under the mist and grab the treasures.Need helps?Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warandmagic/Email: cstyroriaglobal@gmail.com

comments: This keeps freezing up. I win a level using added fish and ball plays and it froze. Now i have to replay it with nothing. This has happened multiple times. I enjoy playing. But game has to many problems
Candy crush, soda crush, & candy crush jellies cuts off for no apparent reason while in gameplay. The game has done that on 4 different devices.
Constantly crashes and freezes taking everything I have away. I took a screenshot but of course I can't post it because it would prove the game doesn't work

Candy crush is an Awesome addicting Game, Same with soda. Jelly is fun, BUT!, It is the most cheating game I have ever played. The AI will always take advantage of beating you with moves that will take what you need 98% of the time. Moves that no one can see but magically the AI knows what to choose to beat you. I love strategy games, but cheating is not a fun for anyone. The AI compition is not a compition. It's a slaghter waste of time until you get lucky or they give it too you. No strategy there. Just piss you off cheating AI. Being the top of Candy Crush and Candy crush soda. And yes also Jelly. It is ridiculous sometimes to waste my time with this one. If the AI opponents played at the highest level of what to use, then I wouldn't mind getting beaten. But when you watch the AI make the dumbest move to get what it needed, tells you that the AI sees the whole board. Even what is hidden. Give up or beat yourself up on this one. I seem to love the Gluten of punishment, lol.

TOP GROSSING!?! YES OF COURSE, bc WE'RE ALL STUPID! I'm playin a level w/ the Monklings, like 124/6 if u watch closely if u catch a long, 6,7,8, row on Monklings KING WILL NOT ALLOW U TO HAVE THE WHOLE row. Watch the number counter not the monklings going under the rope & u will see the counter not go pass a certain number! THE SAME NUMBER continues like 6 will stay 6 4x's! That way u don't beat the level & u have to buy a booster, KING Co are CHEATS!
I love this game a lot. In fact, I like all of the candy crush games. But when will the show come back? Also, when can we play against the Jelly Queen again?
description: There's a new player in town, the wiggling, jiggling Jelly Queen and she's here to challenge you to a game of Candy Crush Jelly Saga!  Whatever your favorite moves, you better hope they're Jellylicious enough to take on the mighty Jelly Queen. The unstoppably spreadable game!  New Candy Crush Jelly Saga is full of delightful new game modes, features and boss battles featuring the Jelly Queen!  Playing as Jenny, show off your Jellylicious moves and take turns switching Candies against the jiggling Jelly Queen. Every sweet move will spread more Jelly and whoever spreads the most will win the level! Have you got the moves? There are splendid new Candies, a marvelous new booster and a dreamy treetop world to explore in the Candy Kingdom too! Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!Candy Crush Jelly Saga is completely free to play but in-game currency, to buy items such as extra moves or lives, will require payment with real money.By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/termsCandy Crush Jelly Saga features:• Over 700 Jellylicious Levels       • New  Boss Modes       • Marvelous game modes including: Spread the Jelly & Release the Pufflers      • Tasty new Color Bomb Lollipop booster    • Mesmerizing new Candies      • Dreamy new treetop world and a host of quirky characters led by the Jelly Queen and her stooges.• Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master      • For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Jellylicious scores• Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internetAlready a fan of Candy Crush Jelly Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:https://www.facebook.com/CandyCrushJellySaga/https://twitter.com/candycrushjellyLast but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Jelly Saga!

comments: Fun and easy to pick up and learn quickly. The game has nice effects and a huge variety of characters to play an upgrade. Music and voices can get sort of annoying but that's what a volume button is for right?

One of the better rpg strategy games out. There's a ton of things available to do if you run out of stamina. The main currency is diamonds which you can purchase but surprisingly they are not that difficult to acquire in game.  Overall I recommend it to anyone who enjoyed games like Fate grand order, syd story and dokkan battle.

description: ◎Game Intro◎Girls X Battle is one of the most popular anime style games in 2016, which contains hundreds of Anime Girls under master summoners command. Girls X Battle is also a game combined with tactics and manually microing features. Each player has to consider not only the skills composition among Battle Girls, furthermore with enhanced gears and timing on skill casting to conquer tough quests, while enjoying competing with other players in PVP. ◎Game Features◎★Conquer Your Path With Over 100 Battle Girls ★Girls X Battle’s biggest feature is that we have crafted our characters into Japanese Anime style Battle Girls, hundreds of them are leading by master summoners. Each of Battle Girls has her own background story and unique skills. If you wish to dominate the world of summoners, not only you need to know each of Battle Girls’ unique skills deeply, but also require tactics and powerful composition to defeat your opponents.★Real-Time Micro, Command Your Battle Girls To Cast Their Ultimate Skills  ★Girls X Battle has the coolest animation effect on each skill cast, while the facial and motions on each girls are carefully crafted and drawn by our designers. Whether during combat or rest, you can see each girl’s motions clearly from walking, swinging her weapon, even when she is seducing. Under master summoners command, you only need one finger to give them your orders.★Timing Cast On Your Skill，Is The Key To Your Victory  ★Unlike the traditional styles RPG Game without any microing！During the battle you have to observe constantly, along with microing on your girls such as interrupting on your opponent’s skill casting, change on your skill directions, crowd control skills on opponent’s girls etc. Another feature of Girl X Battle，experience the joy of giving your Battle Girls command in the battle field, even players with lower Attack Power can win against players with higher Attack Power!★Buying Drinks From The Campus Store, Full of Academy Elements  ★It has been a month since summer recess, don’t you miss the breakfast sold on campus? descriptionHTML:
◎Game Intro◎
Girls X Battle is one of the most popular anime style games in 2016, which contains hundreds of Anime Girls under master summoners command. Girls X Battle is also a game combined with tactics and manually microing features. Each player has to consider not only the skills composition among Battle Girls, furthermore with enhanced gears and timing on skill casting to conquer tough quests, while enjoying competing with other players in PVP.
◎Game Features◎
★Conquer Your Path With Over 100 Battle Girls ★
Girls X Battle’s biggest feature is that we have crafted our characters into Japanese Anime style Battle Girls, hundreds of them are leading by master summoners. Each of Battle Girls has her own background story and unique skills. If you wish to dominate the world of summoners, not only you need to know each of Battle Girls’ unique skills deeply, but also require tactics and powerful composition to defeat your opponents.
★Real-Time Micro, Command Your Battle Girls To Cast Their Ultimate Skills ★
Girls X Battle has the coolest animation effect on each skill cast, while the facial and motions on each girls are carefully crafted and drawn by our designers. Whether during combat or rest, you can see each girl’s motions clearly from walking, swinging her weapon, even when she is seducing. Under master summoners command, you only need one finger to give them your orders.
★Timing Cast On Your Skill，Is The Key To Your Victory ★
Unlike the traditional styles RPG Game without any microing！During the battle you have to observe constantly, along with microing on your girls such as interrupting on your opponent’s skill casting, change on your skill directions, crowd control skills on opponent’s girls etc. Another feature of Girl X Battle，experience the joy of giving your Battle Girls command in the battle field, even players with lower Attack Power can win against players with higher Attack Power!
★Buying Drinks From The Campus Store, Full of Academy Elements ★
It has been a month since summer recess, don’t you miss the breakfast sold on campus? In Girls X Battle，you may even face variety quizzes as in the actual school. Besides the Battle Girls' world we made, there are numerous tasks await you to conquer. If you favor in PVP, try to fight your way up to the Top Floor!
