description: ライン・ストラテジーRPG『メルクストーリア -癒術士と鈴のしらべ-』（メルスト）4周年を迎えアニメ化も決定したメルストを今後共よろしくお願いします！■□■□■□■メルクストーリア 3 つの特徴■□■□■□■● 超本格！ライン・ストラテジーRPG！！かわいいキャラが簡単操作でサクサク動くのに、とっても硬派なライン・ストラテジーRPG！戦略ゲームと RPG（ロールプレイング）の要素を組み合わせた新ジャンルタイトル！パーティメンバーとなるユニットを育成し、待ち受ける数多のクエストに挑戦!!戦略的にパーティの陣形を維持しつつ、モンスターとの絆の証、『ティンクルシード』で一発大逆転を狙おう！！● リアルタイム救援で「激ムズ」突破を目指せ！ストーリークエストには「ふつう」・「ムズ」・「激ムズ」の３段階を用意！「ふつう」でも一筋縄ではいかないのに、「激ムズ」の難易度はまさに「激ムズ」！！そんな時は、ゲーム内に常設されているログを活用して、ギルドメンバーや同じルームに所属しているプレイヤー達に救援をお願いして協力プレイ！攻略中のクエストに続々と駆け付けるプレイヤー達の姿はまさに圧巻！● “へたれ癒術士と瓶の少女の冒険譚”才能に恵まれつつも、冴えない日常に埋没する少年と、自らを探す旅を望む、瓶の中の少女…魅力溢れるかわいいキャラクター達と、個性的なモンスター達が画面狭しと紡いでいく、ファンタジックコミカルストーリーをお楽しみください。■□■□■□■公式ツイッター（ティティ）■□■□■□■泣いてばかりな、こーほー担当のティティが、メルストの攻略法や最新情報、運営からのお知らせをつぶやいているよ♪忘れずにフォローして、メルストの最新情報をチェックしよう！https://twitter.com/merc_storia

description: HỢP KÍCH 36 THẾ - XƯNG ĐẾ THIÊN HẠ“Một trong những sản phẩm game thẻ tướng chiến thuật chất lượng nhất đến từ Studio của Netease – một trong những công ty game lớn nhất thế giới, Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng xứng đáng là trò chơi công phá năm 2018 được game thủ kì vọng nhất.” – Sendor Grimer – BTV Gamek.vn1. PHÁT HÀNH TOÀN CẦU VỚI NHIỀU NGÔN NGỮ TẠI NHIỀU QUỐC GIAPhát triển từ một Studio thuộc Tencent, Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng đã được phát hành tại 6 quốc gia thị trường lớn trên thế giới bao gồm: Malaysia, Indonesia, Thái Lan, Hồng Kông, Đài Loan, Macao và bản tiếng Anh toàn cầu. Việt Nam chính là thị trường tiếp theo phát hành trò chơi chiến thuật đang cực kì thành công này.2. ĐẶC THÙ VÀ DUY NHẤT: BỘ TƯỚNG HỢP KÍCH – XUẤT CHIÊU BÍ TRUYỀNTrong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng, mỗi bộ tướng đều có duyên phận, không chỉ kích hoạt các chỉ số đặc biệt khi cùng có mặt trong trận hình, mà còn giúp nhân vật mạnh nhất trong bộ tướng đó thay đổi kĩ năng hoàn toàn mới để xuất tuyệt chiêu hợp kích Bí Truyền. Đây là tính năng chưa một game chiến thuật nào có trên thị trường Việt Nam hiện tại.3. THỜI TRANG QUYẾT ĐỊNH CHIẾN THUẬT – ĐỔI THỜI TRANG, ĐỔI KĨ NĂNGHệ thống thời trang của Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng không chỉ đẹp, “khủng” mà còn đem đến những chỉ số, hiệu ứng thuộc tính và bộ kỹ năng mới đặc thù trên từng bộ thời trang. Vì vậy, khi thay đổi thời trang, nghĩa là người chơi sẽ thay đổi hoàn toàn đặc tính và chiến thuật của trận hình. Đặc biệt, các bộ thời trang này không được cộng dồn thuộc tính, khiến cho trò chơi trở nên trí tuệ hơn nhiều.5. GIẢI ĐẤU ĐỈNH PHONG – VINH DANH TẠC TƯỢNG LIÊN SERVERĐây là tính năng PvP thi đấu liên server trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng, nơi hội tụ tất cả những game thủ mạnh nhất tại các server, tham gia tranh tài để tìm ra người chiến thắng. Giải đấu được tổ chức như một vòng chung kết WorldCup, thi đấu chia bảng và các vòng đấu cực kỳ hấp dẫn. Ngoài danh hiệu, được tạc tượng liên server, người chơi tham gia giải đấu sẽ nhận thưởng điểm tích lũy dùng để đổi lấy các mảnh tướng Đỏ siêu hiếm. Người chơi khác cũng có thể ủng hộ, bình chọn và cổ vũ những người chơi tham gia giải đấu để nhận thưởng nhiều phần quà giá trị.6. 37 HIỆU ỨNG – TÙY HỨNG TRẬN HÌNH – SO TRÌNH CHIẾN THUẬTChiến thuật trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng được thay đổi liên tục thông qua các hiệu ứng kĩ năng của tướng như tăng tốc, hóa đá, đóng băng, thiêu đốt, x2 sát thương… Các hiệu ứng này sẽ ảnh hưởng mạnh mẽ đến cách chơi và cách bố trận của game thủ sao cho hiệu quả nhất, từ đó phân định đẳng cấp trí tuệ của người chơi.7. HỆ THỐNG PET ĐA DẠNG, BUFF HIỆU ỨNG TĂNG CHỈ SỐ CHO TƯỚNGTiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng là một trong số hiếm các game chiến thuật có sử dụng hệ thống Pet khi xuất trận. Các Pet này khi xuất chiến sẽ cộng chỉ số khá lớn cho tướng trong đội hình bao gồm cả hiệu ứng. Mỗi Pet sẽ có các chỉ số riêng tùy thuộc vào chiến thuật của người chơi mà tùy biến sử dụng loại Pet hợp lý khi xuất trận. Pet cũng là một trong những thứ có thể show hàng thể hiện sự độc đáo, oai phong cho nhân vật.8. BẠN SẼ KHÔNG CÔ ĐƠN KHI CHƠI GAMEMặc dù là game thẻ tướng chiến thuật Tam Quốc, thế nhưng Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng không hề “tự kỉ” khi có rất nhiều tính năng cộng đồng cho phép tương tác giữa người  chơi với nhau. Với hệ thống bang hội đặc sắc, bang chiến khốc liệt, tổ đội tinh anh, vận tiêu bang hội, công thành chiến, phụ bản liên server, voice chat liên server… thì bạn sẽ không thể cảm thấy cô đơn khi tham gia vào game. CÁC TÍNH NĂNG ĐẶC SẮC KHÁC:KHAI PHÁ LÃNH THỔ, CHIẾM ĐOẠT TÀI NGUYÊNTHÍ LUYỆN HỔ TƯỚNG, XƯNG BÁ THIÊN HẠBẾ QUAN TỎA CẢNGTRÙNG LUYỆN TRANG BỊBANG HỘI ĐẠI LOẠN MÔNBOSS THẾ GIỚITHÔNG THIÊN THÁPVIỄN CHINH TAM QUỐCCƯỚP KỶ VẬTPHỤ BẢN EXP, PET, BẠCĐẤU TRƯỜNG 1vs1
descriptionHTML:
HỢP KÍCH 36 THẾ - XƯNG ĐẾ THIÊN HẠ
“Một trong những sản phẩm game thẻ tướng chiến thuật chất lượng nhất đến từ Studio của Netease – một trong những công ty game lớn nhất thế giới, Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng xứng đáng là trò chơi công phá năm 2018 được game thủ kì vọng nhất.” – Sendor Grimer – BTV Gamek.vn
1. PHÁT HÀNH TOÀN CẦU VỚI NHIỀU NGÔN NGỮ TẠI NHIỀU QUỐC GIA
Phát triển từ một Studio thuộc Tencent, Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng đã được phát hành tại 6 quốc gia thị trường lớn trên thế giới bao gồm: Malaysia, Indonesia, Thái Lan, Hồng Kông, Đài Loan, Macao và bản tiếng Anh toàn cầu. Việt Nam chính là thị trường tiếp theo phát hành trò chơi chiến thuật đang cực kì thành công này.
2. ĐẶC THÙ VÀ DUY NHẤT: BỘ TƯỚNG HỢP KÍCH – XUẤT CHIÊU BÍ TRUYỀN
Trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng, mỗi bộ tướng đều có duyên phận, không chỉ kích hoạt các chỉ số đặc biệt khi cùng có mặt trong trận hình, mà còn giúp nhân vật mạnh nhất trong bộ tướng đó thay đổi kĩ năng hoàn toàn mới để xuất tuyệt chiêu hợp kích Bí Truyền. Đây là tính năng chưa một game chiến thuật nào có trên thị trường Việt Nam hiện tại.
3. THỜI TRANG QUYẾT ĐỊNH CHIẾN THUẬT – ĐỔI THỜI TRANG, ĐỔI KĨ NĂNG
Hệ thống thời trang của Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng không chỉ đẹp, “khủng” mà còn đem đến những chỉ số, hiệu ứng thuộc tính và bộ kỹ năng mới đặc thù trên từng bộ thời trang. Vì vậy, khi thay đổi thời trang, nghĩa là người chơi sẽ thay đổi hoàn toàn đặc tính và chiến thuật của trận hình. Đặc biệt, các bộ thời trang này không được cộng dồn thuộc tính, khiến cho trò chơi trở nên trí tuệ hơn nhiều.
5. GIẢI ĐẤU ĐỈNH PHONG – VINH DANH TẠC TƯỢNG LIÊN SERVER
Đây là tính năng PvP thi đấu liên server trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng, nơi hội tụ tất cả những game thủ mạnh nhất tại các server, tham gia tranh tài để tìm ra người chiến thắng. Giải đấu được tổ chức như một vòng chung kết WorldCup, thi đấu chia bảng và các vòng đấu cực kỳ hấp dẫn. Ngoài danh hiệu, được tạc tượng liên server, người chơi tham gia giải đấu sẽ nhận thưởng điểm tích lũy dùng để đổi lấy các mảnh tướng Đỏ siêu hiếm. Người chơi khác cũng có thể ủng hộ, bình chọn và cổ vũ những người chơi tham gia giải đấu để nhận thưởng nhiều phần quà giá trị.
6. 37 HIỆU ỨNG – TÙY HỨNG TRẬN HÌNH – SO TRÌNH CHIẾN THUẬT
Chiến thuật trong Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng được thay đổi liên tục thông qua các hiệu ứng kĩ năng của tướng như tăng tốc, hóa đá, đóng băng, thiêu đốt, x2 sát thương… Các hiệu ứng này sẽ ảnh hưởng mạnh mẽ đến cách chơi và cách bố trận của game thủ sao cho hiệu quả nhất, từ đó phân định đẳng cấp trí tuệ của người chơi.
7. HỆ THỐNG PET ĐA DẠNG, BUFF HIỆU ỨNG TĂNG CHỈ SỐ CHO TƯỚNG
Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng là một trong số hiếm các game chiến thuật có sử dụng hệ thống Pet khi xuất trận. Các Pet này khi xuất chiến sẽ cộng chỉ số khá lớn cho tướng trong đội hình bao gồm cả hiệu ứng. Mỗi Pet sẽ có các chỉ số riêng tùy thuộc vào chiến thuật của người chơi mà tùy biến sử dụng loại Pet hợp lý khi xuất trận. Pet cũng là một trong những thứ có thể show hàng thể hiện sự độc đáo, oai phong cho nhân vật.
8. BẠN SẼ KHÔNG CÔ ĐƠN KHI CHƠI GAME
Mặc dù là game thẻ tướng chiến thuật Tam Quốc, thế nhưng Tiểu Tiểu Ngũ Hổ Tướng không hề “tự kỉ” khi có rất nhiều tính năng cộng đồng cho phép tương tác giữa người chơi với nhau. Với hệ thống bang hội đặc sắc, bang chiến khốc liệt, tổ đội tinh anh, vận tiêu bang hội, công thành chiến, phụ bản liên server, voice chat liên server… thì bạn sẽ không thể cảm thấy cô đơn khi tham gia vào game.

CÁC TÍNH NĂNG ĐẶC SẮC KHÁC:
KHAI PHÁ LÃNH THỔ, CHIẾM ĐOẠT TÀI NGUYÊN
THÍ LUYỆN HỔ TƯỚNG, XƯNG BÁ THIÊN HẠ
BẾ QUAN TỎA CẢNG
TRÙNG LUYỆN TRANG BỊ
BANG HỘI ĐẠI LOẠN MÔN
BOSS THẾ GIỚI
THÔNG THIÊN THÁP
VIỄN CHINH TAM QUỐC
CƯỚP KỶ VẬT
PHỤ BẢN EXP, PET, BẠC
ĐẤU TRƯỜNG 1vs1

comments: Ive been playing this for a year and a half and i can say this game is NOT a pay to win. Pull rates are pretty much the same as in any other game, and units are tradable 90% of the time so its possible to get units you want even if youre not lucky enough to get them from packs. Platinum units are super helpful and are now much easier to get thanks to golden medals which are pretty easy to get in events. Theres different events, some are for unions, some you play for yourself. Also, a game with most friendly users ive met in games, willing to give a lot of help and advice to new players. All in all, ive played for a long time and i dont see myself stopping any time soon unless theres drastic changes

I love this game. Though they don't explain how to obtain platinum medals or how unions work very well. And I would like it if we could exchange 7s units better. I could list 10 units I'd rather have then idun. I would love to exchange her for a Gilles de rais or a fenrir. But no I have to keep this unit I don't want. Because my idun can't even be sold on the bazaar. Though those are my only problems. I'm addicted to this game.

It's really a good game. I've been playing this for a long time. The reason I didn't give 5 star is because there is a player who start arguing with the other player for no reason and i hope i can report this to the game developer but my friend say it would never work.

I've been encountering some problems with the game in terms of going through a quest. It just suddenly bonked me out of the game everytime i get to the boss. I've tried clearing the cache  and reinstalling it but  to  no avail.  I'm using an oppof1s  and whether I connect through  Wi-Fi or other means. It does the same thing. Would like some help with this

I have two copies of this 7* card that is essential to my deck at the moment. Unfortunately they screech this annoying Yossshh yaattaadaraa!!!!!! EVERY freaking time they launch a special. Then freaking golden apples fill up the screen. Unfortunately they are two of my strongest cards. Thinking of dropping this game.

Been playing for a long time seeing the game develop but as of recently when they switched to parade. Pay to play has been so heavily support worse than other games from the platinum club or vip to basically making it impossible to win or even compete without spending money in events especially when they make event units untradable this has not happened for 2 years the game has been out and now they r just plain greedy this game is committing game suicide and it was such a great game before but now they always have their hands out for money its really disappointing.

comments: This is just amazing! Once you get started it gets a little tough, but you can have other people help you if your stuck. I love the easy gameplay and the graphics, The only problem I have with it is how hard I is to get ninja pearls without money, I'm young and dont have a credit card or job yet so I miss quite a few opportunities. I highly recommend to any Naruto fans.

This game is very great and can be addicting. The only problem u have is that when ever I try to play a mission it always says there is a communication error. I would really like to keep playing the game, so if there is anything you could do about it- that would be great.

your servers are bad.. trying to hunt Chino but 2 times already when we finish the last map and i see the yellow card of the last boss, then i get connection lost and don't get a thing in the end.. it is really frustrating to play for 15 minutes, see your goal fulfilled but then.. nooooo, you don't get the cards in the end

I love the game, but during multi-player, especially in impact missions, let us continue even if player 1 gives up. It's extremely annoying when you play to the boss, and their hp is very low,  and player 1 leaves and all that time was for nothing. Let player 2 and 3 continue, even if player 1 and 3 or 1 and 2 quit, let that last player control the other two. That's the only improvement I can think of for the next update.

I absolutely love this game, and have never had any issues with it. but today it froze on the loading screen when connecting to an online match, I had to force restart my phone and now everytime I try to start the app it stays stuck on the loading screen until it times out. I love this game please fix so I can continue playing and rate 5 stars.

I'm only putting it as one star in hopes the devs see this, but please find a better way to recover accounts. I've been a fan of this game for years and when I logged in I was logged out, I have no idea what my transfer info is because I've only had to do that once. I don't want to just start over, please find a better way for people to get their accounts back once your update logs them out.

descriptionHTML:
NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing – Join the battle with your favorite NARUTO characters, fighting in Shinobi Formation Battles across the story of the renowned anime!

Fight hordes of enemies and complete missions using the all-new Shinobi Formation Battle system: a strategic RPG fighting system that unleashes exhilarating combination attacks with your allies. Master team field skills, discover new ninjutsu and become the next Hokage in the first-ever Ultimate Ninja mobile game!

NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing Features:

Battle Enemies with Your Ninja Dream Team!
• Control over 100 NARUTO heroes, each with their own unique attacks and tactics
• Fight enemies using ninjutsu, powerful special techniques and combination attacks
• Unleash ninjutsu abilities for powerful offensive strikes, defensive abilities that can stop enemy movement, and more

Mission Mode Based On the Original Anime Storyline!
• Mission Mode allows you to relive the experience of the NARUTO story
• Battle through stories from the original series

Ninja Skills and Powerful Attacks!
• Fighting skills include close-ranged and combination attacks for massive damage
• Ninja Field Skills can turn the tide of battle in your favor
• Fighting closely with your team allows for great opportunity, but also great risk

Fight Ninjas from Around the World in Online Multiplayer Games!
• Battle against other ninjas in multiplayer mode
• Join together and take on missions with up to 3 other ninjas

New Games in Monthly Phantom Castle Events!
• Compete against other ninjas for the most points and aim for the top in a special mode that can only be accessed during special events
• Battle against a multitude of enemies that await you as you climb the Phantom Castle

Join the battle with your favorite NARUTO characters! Download NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing now and become the next Hokage!

comments: EA please keep improving, i already in love playing this game until i realized that i had to spend a lot amount of money to upgrade my team and collecting great cards.. actually im not feeling good at this because i'm not a rich guy that could paid all those packs with very high price.. im saying this to represent all f2p players out there, although im not so f2p at all. i only spent a dollar to buy that eoe pass and nothing again until now. so please, give a chance for f2p player to keep playing this game with no jealousy with those high overall p2p players.. thanks

Be careful on this game, its possible to spend real money and get absolutely nothing in return! For example I bought a Saint Patrick pack, 1000 gems a pack and got 10 lucky leafs, I could use the lucky to buy another pack, which I got a lucky leafs from, so I spent 10 lucky leafs got 1 lucky leaf that I couldnt use  unless I brought more! Literally got nothing for my money. This is EAs way of mugging people.

Please add more sounds effect on this game, and fix the sfx that already on this app. I hope you add full match online like the other game (90 minutes) so we just not attack but defends too. Replay button must be great, and i have idea that you guys add event like "best goal of the week" or so, from that replay, we can save, and send to you, and you can choose who will win it. I think it will make people playing this game. Commentator should be great too if you add full match versus online. I love this game, please read it. Egy Maulana V plays for Lechia Gdańsk now. Add it! Add to all of your fifa games. That replay button should be great

I just saved up all my team hero points, watched a heap of ads so I could build up stamina so I could do my best to try to get Mané in team heroes. About half way through collecting my hero rewards, the rewards pages started to go blank, and the last 25 packs I opened were empty. Is there any way to correct this?

The game is good but it could be better. Elite players are too expensive  so it's hard to upgrade team. Informs and special cards are all untradable so unless you get lucky in events you won't get a chance to play with them. The new layout is better though. Unless you have plenty of time or money don't expect to progress in this game all that quickly. Mobile games should not be as grindy as console games.

What's wrong with this game. I was playing Vs mode and was in world class level and got more then 600000 fans.and now I saw I'm in pro level.how it could be automaticy.fix it pls what the hell is going on.i make my progress playing v hard and all gone with in movement.even I did not play and lose.
description: FIFA Mobile has been reimagined to bring you the most authentic and exciting mobile soccer game you’ll ever experience! Get a free Cristiano Ronaldo item to start building and managing your team. Train any player to superstar status, attack opponents, and keep coming back for daily content all season long. Plus, get into the game on the go with a download size of under 100 MB. Whether you’re a savvy veteran or just starting out on the pitch, FIFA Mobile is your source for soccer.BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM™Develop the most competitive squad when you choose any 11 players from over 550 real teams, including stars from past and present, and train them to over 100 OVR. Add depth to your roster, manage your lineup on the fly, and quickly tweak tactics before every match. Make the right calls and watch your club become the Ultimate Team. ATTACK TO WINTake on thrilling matches that drop you into your offensive possessions with VS Attack mode. This innovative level of competition kicks your game into high gear while you strive to dominate 90-second matches, climb the leaderboards, and earn seasonal rewards year-round. KEEP UP WITH REAL-WORLD EVENTSStay connected to real-world soccer as it happens across the globe. Test your skills in single-player Campaign mode, then challenge yourself with uniquely themed Events where you can earn incredible prizes.JOIN A LEAGUE, CONQUER THE WORLDParticipate in Leagues, a truly social experience that allows you to join forces and strive for glory with friends and gamers around the globe. Test your skills in inter-league championships, or take on the best gamers worldwide in League vs. League Tournaments to climb the leaderboards and prove your talent on the pitch.This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.User Agreement: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/enVisit http://help.ea.com/en/# for assistance or inquiries.EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.

recentChanges: This mid-season update introduces an abundance of gameplay improvements to continue delivering the quality of experiences you demand, including:
- All-new Squad Building Challenges, rolling out weekly
- Enhanced Leagues with improved ability to search, auto-join, and updated social features
- Full Winter Transfer roster updates complete

comments: A good graphics for a good beginning franchise. A well tame game for an anime base. But my concerns on playing this game is sometimes ita forcing crash. (I thought this was a high end game so basically you need a good phone that can handle a game like this) im looking forward for better improvements such as more charcaters to come. And much more sfx. Big thumbs up for this game.

Great game and graphics. Need to work on the optimization though as constant crashes occurs. Will also be thrilled to see rework on Yomo as he looks really plain in this game. Character collision and ability lock in also needs improvement, especially those with dashes which will be better to have single target lock in. Overall as a TG fan I love this game.

The game is absolutely amazing ^^ This is definitely one of the better start up games in the app store. I would love to see more improvement with the graphics, load time, and effects. I can't wait to see the characters that will be added next. If I may I'd like to suggest that everyone's eyeball fascinated mask maker be added. Uta is definitely one of my favorite characters and it's a shame Yomo was implemented but not Uta. Many wishes for this game ^^

I have been waiting for someone to make a Tokyo ghoul game now here it is. What can I say about this game other then its awesome I love it , but I do wish they would add more characters and maybe add some from the Tokyo ghoul re manga but anyways awesome game. Now someone needs to make a my hero academia game then a one piece game and I'll be happy.

Had been really enjoying this game despite the consistent crashes.  Now; however, the game won't even start.  It stays stuck on the beginning loading screen.  Please fix and I will update my review.  EDIT:  issue fixed.  Looks like it was maintenance they didn't bother announcing until after the fact.  Love the game so still 5 stars but would be nice to have to some advance notice with these things.

Ok, as fun as this game is, it has a lot of problems. Severe lagging during missions and crashing, just to name the few. On top of that, lately I can't even start up the game, cuz I get stack on the loading screen before I can even log in into the server. Very disappointed. There's hoping the devs will fix that issue soon, since this game shows a lot of potential.
description: Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.- Especially designed for mobile devices!Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!- Rich solo and team gameplay!Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart’s content!
descriptionHTML:
Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.

- Especially designed for mobile devices!
Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.

- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!
The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.

- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!
Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!

- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!
Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!

- Rich solo and team gameplay!
Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart’s content!
developerAddress:
19031 33rd Ave W Ste 100
Lynnwood, WA 98036
recentChanges: 1. Optimized the novice guide to make the game more enjoyable
2. Fix the incorrect ognization rank rewards
3. Fix the bug that battle times in arena does not restore evey hour as described
4. Fixed the bug that hero debris was not double dropped in double drop event
5. Add more chapters in ognization boss
6. Add new world boss
7. Optimized the in game chat
8. Optimized the server select interface
9. Optimizef the VIP interface
10. Add new Ghouls Expulsion in game
summary: 3D mobile game based on Tokyo Ghoul.Officially authorized by Studio Pierrot!
title: Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War

comments: Great game!!! Still some bug's. You have to log out and log back in to collect the 5 hour daily rewards. Sometimes you can't post in the chat rooms. It will say invalid character. A lot of lag at times when you use the power and impact gauge. There needs to be more options to customize character's and or add more. I also believe the daily 5 hour rewards need to change instead of the same rewards everyday. It is a fun game, and highly addictive. Great graphics, which still could be improved on, looking at newer golf games coming out.
Great game.  Only problem is the huge 10 second warning that covers your shot.   Also the game meter jumps.  So I get penalties for taking longer than 10 seconds when I let the control bar reset.

Almost great. The UI is a crowded mess. Too much nonsense. The equipment tabs are broken due to bugs(I downloaded on several devices) making it impossible to accurately navigate between items, and the putting is rigged(obvious padding) resulting in missed shots that shouldn't happen. Besides these glaring flaws there is great potential here.

A great game easy to play and progress.  Only issue is i can't work out how to change my country from the usa to aus. Sick to death of my putts begging taken off me because you have ridiculously stupid gamer play.  If I putt a ball in real life and it hits the edge of a cup it goes in 90 pc of the time.  If I putt one to the lip of the cup in real life it goes ohm.  But bout your retarded physics.  They stop the ball on the edge or knock it away from the hole. What a load of bulls$/^. Fix this and I may consider upping the rating

I really like this game other than the BIRDS IN THE BACKGROUND!!! Shut them up PLEASE!!! It's very annoying and makes me not want to play this game I have to play it with the volume turned down so I don't have to hear the freaking BIRDS!

Fine before the update. Now it glitches and freezes. Cannot finish a round. Power bar no longer smooth. Not enjoyable to play. I wanted to quit in the middle of the round. Very disappointed in latest update. I hope this is fixed soon. This was my favorite game on mobile device ever and I want to go babe to playing it!
description: Experience the first real-time, multi-player mobile golf game!Introducing Golf Star™, the greatest golf game you’ll ever play, featuring realistic graphics, golfing techniques mastered by the pros, and a simulation powered by real physics-based gameplay. Play with golfers from all over the world!Language support: English, 한국어, Deutsch, Français, Português, Español, 日本語, 中文简体, or 中文繁體. , Indonesia, ไทย.* The game won't be available on some of the low-end devices that do not support Tegra 2. * Access permission notice for gameplay· STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.· PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.· CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.Stunning Graphics and True-to-Life Golf Physics!- Golf Star features stunningly beautiful graphics unlike anything you've ever seen before.- Experience the exhilaration of being on a real golf course!- Terrain height, ball impact angle, wind, temperature, humidity, and up to 70 other factors implemented to perfectly capture the physics of a real swing.Various Skills and Techniques- We’ve captured the skills and techniques of real-life pro golfers.- Become a pro golfer and choose from up to 15 techniques to use, including draw shots, fade shots, and chip shots.Different Game Modes- Career Mode: Play Single Player rounds and Quests, or compete in the NPC Tournament.- Match Challenge/Tournament Mode: You can enjoy 1:1 Tournament on a real time basis with players from all around the world.- Grand Championship: Meet the tournament score requirement to advance to a higher tournament and compete for the true master.- Customized Tournament: You can be the host of a tournament! Customize your own tournament and award prizes to attending players.- Skins Mode: Max. of 4 players will compete against each other to win each hole, and the winner will earn the prize money.World Championship- Participate in the weekly World Championship Match and claim victory to win awesome rewards!- Win all the major tournaments for the ultimate grand slam!Golf Tournaments!- Play a new tournament every week and win prizes.- Become the world’s greatest Pro Golfer, and achieve the Grand Slam.Guild System- Create a Guild with users from all over the world!- Complete Guild Missions all together with your Guild Members and acquire various items from the Guild Shop!  - Enjoy competing against other Guilds in the Guild Battle League! Daily Mission System- Complete various missions every day to get amazing rewards.- You can become the best player by completing the missions every day!Hall of Fame- Compete against players from all around the world and enter the Hall of Fame!• Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item. • For Com2uS Mobile Game Terms of Service, visit http://www.withhive.com/.- Terms of Service : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T1- Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3• For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting http://www.withhive.com/help/inquire
descriptionHTML:
Experience the first real-time, multi-player mobile golf game!

Introducing Golf Star™, the greatest golf game you’ll ever play, featuring realistic graphics, golfing techniques mastered by the pros, and a simulation powered by real physics-based gameplay. Play with golfers from all over the world!

Language support: English, 한국어, Deutsch, Français, Português, Español, 日本語, 中文简体, or 中文繁體. , Indonesia, ไทย.

* The game won't be available on some of the low-end devices that do not support Tegra 2.

* Access permission notice for gameplay
· STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
· PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
· CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.

Stunning Graphics and True-to-Life Golf Physics!
- Golf Star features stunningly beautiful graphics unlike anything you've ever seen before.
- Experience the exhilaration of being on a real golf course!
- Terrain height, ball impact angle, wind, temperature, humidity, and up to 70 other factors implemented to perfectly capture the physics of a real swing.

Various Skills and Techniques
- We’ve captured the skills and techniques of real-life pro golfers.
- Become a pro golfer and choose from up to 15 techniques to use, including draw shots, fade shots, and chip shots.

Different Game Modes
- Career Mode: Play Single Player rounds and Quests, or compete in the NPC Tournament.
- Match Challenge/Tournament Mode: You can enjoy 1:1 Tournament on a real time basis with players from all around the world.
- Grand Championship: Meet the tournament score requirement to advance to a higher tournament and compete for the true master.
- Customized Tournament: You can be the host of a tournament! Customize your own tournament and award prizes to attending players.
- Skins Mode: Max. of 4 players will compete against each other to win each hole, and the winner will earn the prize money.

World Championship
- Participate in the weekly World Championship Match and claim victory to win awesome rewards!
- Win all the major tournaments for the ultimate grand slam!

Golf Tournaments!
- Play a new tournament every week and win prizes.
- Become the world’s greatest Pro Golfer, and achieve the Grand Slam.

Guild System
- Create a Guild with users from all over the world!
- Complete Guild Missions all together with your Guild Members and acquire various items from the Guild Shop!
- Enjoy competing against other Guilds in the Guild Battle League!

Daily Mission System
- Complete various missions every day to get amazing rewards.
- You can become the best player by completing the missions every day!

Hall of Fame
- Compete against players from all around the world and enter the Hall of Fame!

comments: Extremely addictive! First day I played I overshot my bus stop by 5 minutes because I forgot to look up.  There is always something to do in the game somewhere - and the micro transaction bit doesn't feel forced, and you can easily progress without it.  It kept me occupied for days - unfortunately I had to delete it because I got too caught up.  So if you're looking for a game to grab your attention and keep you entertained on long commutes and the like, this is great for that

Fun little game, but I would love for food, and water, to be a little bit faster. Also maybe rise up the rush chances. I do have 1 suggestion, maybe when the people off to the Waste Lands, they can find some rare stuff, like gems or maybe clothes/weapons. This game is really fun, even though I've just started it, keep up the great work! 👍🏽

I figured my old ass phone wouldnt run this game when first announced, just confirming for folks it sure doesnt. I thought there might be a chance it would cos my phone is rooted and I have full control over how my ram is utilized. Thank bob for android emulators on desktop, can't wait to play :)

Look, I can kind of understand dwellers not dropping their assignments to fight raiders, but can we have the ability to assign fighters to the raiders themselves. It's a massive and unnecessary pain to constantly remind my few armed dwellers to actually fight the raiders instead of just looking cute in the room they just left. Weapons are scarce in this game, and raiders move too often to play pass the gun. It would also be nice if there was a pause feature, but that would reduce the butler-bot purchases.

Fantastic! A resource management sim that is incredibly fresh and charming thanks to the richness of the Fallout franchise. Keeps you coming back for hours. From the quirkiness of the dwellers to the depth of the side quest system, this game is deserving of your time. Finally, the game is totally playable without paying. Still, throw the devs a few bucks! You'll sink hours into this title.

Absolutely love this game. If you're a die hard fallout fan, or even someone new to the series this is the perfect game for you. You'll get a sense of nostalgia pulling your first legendary dweller, or a sigh of relief when you obtain that last part for the weapon you've been looking to craft. Fallout Shelter is the perfect mobile game for any fan of the series. The game is slow and hard in the beginning but when you get on your feet you'll never want to put it down. If you're on the edge about downloading it please do, it's worth all the time and space!
description: ** Google Play Best of 2015  **Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE AwardsWinner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo "Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZoneBUILD THE PERFECT VAULTCreate a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.CUSTOMIZETurn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.PROSPERA well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly! EXPLORE THE WASTELAND Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!PROTECT YOUR VAULTFrom time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.
descriptionHTML:
** Google Play Best of 2015 **
Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat
"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo
"Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZone

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY
Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.

CUSTOMIZE
Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly!

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

Bethesda Softworks LLC
1370 Piccard Drive, Suite 120
Rockville, MD 28050

title: Fallout Shelter

comments: pretty good game except that they still havent been able to fix the bugs that prevents the game to be accessed easily. always getting a black screen after the intro or it says network unstable. from the other reviews, its affecting android phones. prolly fix this issue before other fixes i guess

This game is not stable on android phones at all. I find i cannot play it "due to network instability" on my phone when I can on my iPad, using the same wifi network.  It crashes and sometimes lags.  Very frustrating. #firstworldproblems
I can't play it if im using data. But if im on wifi, its all good. This only happens to me after i change my phone from Huawei Mate 9 to Mate 10. Pls get it fix!
This is a fun game to play, when it loads. It shows the video of the Tsum Tsums then it freezes on a black screen. Very annoying that it takes 5 or 6 attempts to start it before you can play.

I like this game a lot, but it has some one big frustration. In a game that involves the collection of various characters, it can be disheartening to spend money on this game and still not get the tsum tsum you want,  even during the so-called "lucky times". I recommend keeping your money in your wallet since it is unlikely that you collect the ones that you want, when you want them.   There is also a minor glitch in loading the game, but if you try multiple times, it will eventually load.

Huwaei P9 Lite DON'T PLAY IT!!  I used to play this game all the time and I even got all my friends to play it... BUT sadly it stopped working on my phone months and months ago (almost like... A year?). It is very sad because I did love it but now I just can't find a way of getting it to work on my phone. PLEASE FIX IT!

LINE: Disney Tsum Tsum is the fluffiest puzzle game ever! Collect, connect and pop Tsum Tsum based on the popular Disney Tsum Tsum plushes.

Mickey Mouse, Winnie the Pooh, Frozen and more beloved Disney characters are here!

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains social media links to connect with others and in-app purchases that cost real money.

How to Play
-Collect Tsum Tsum and set your favorite as your MyTsum.
-Connect 3 or more of the same Tsum Tsum to pop them.
-The more Tsum Tsum you connect, the more points you'll get!
-Trigger off Fever Mode to rack up a whole bunch of extra points!
-Each Tsum Tsum has a different skill. Use the one that matches your play style! Find a strategy that works for you!

LINE Disney Tsum Tsum is published by LINE under license from Disney.

Best game on play store It's really a challenging game and also it's addictive Graphics are Damm good And story line is pretty good till now Waiting for chapter 4. But in chapter4 after completing a mission game freezes. And I loose all the awards.. Please fix this asap.. It's been more than a month for update to come and with this type of error it's sucks

More and more focus on pay to win and the 4th weapon, the distance weapon makes it too complex and disturbing. In particular the boomerangs because there are almost no chances to avoid a hit. In unequal battles the inferior just got an extra disadvantage --> no David vs goliath anymore possible. It sucks

First I was very excited by the update. Then I updated it and there came the problems.. at first everything was ok, then I wasn't able to win any mission, game just freezed.. Then I bought a pack of cards and since I m stuck In a loop that makes me win the same reward again and again like if it was the first time when I open the app. I am not able to play at all, the app is basically useless now. PLEASE UPDATE

This is the worst chapter or update in  the game.. when I saw notification of the update I was very excited but when I opened this game the main quest was insane difficulty so I started side quest which was easy difficulty, but it was not for me it was easy for the enemy.. I played that more than 10 times but I didn't win 2 rounds so I just came here and wrote this review... And if you think I'm a noob.. then yes I am but only in this chapter not in previous ones..

At first look it didn't mesmerise me, but after 2-3 matches I feel in love with it! It is awesome and has tons of weapons and other stuffs. The multiplayer option is also great and chest opening is such a treat. One worry is that the weapon below the primary weapon is still locked (why I don't know), otherwise the game is superb. Graphics are top notch and fighting doesn't come more realistic than that!
description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes

comments: This game has been great to me forever, and I never had a complaint but this recent update has driven me here. The trophy cap is a real kick in the nuts and ruins the game for casual gamers like me. You now HAVE to advance through the games prestige system and keep resetting all your work just to help out a gang. And if you are in a strict gang like I am, they require 100 trophies a day. If I keep advancing, I won't be able to keep up with that. This is all a money grab by zepto now. They want you to have to pay to keep your machines strong so you can compete.

I love this game. I have been playing it for a very long time. I play it every single day. I like the new updates however it seems you are getting away from the original game and focusing more on ultimate machines. Increasing the prestige levels was awesome but you need to also add additional upgrades with them as well. I have over 100 paw upgrades that are completely useless to me at the moment.

Look this was a great game, worthy of it's previous accolades. Sadly since then it's been progressively ruined by an ever more aggressively enforced attempt to move to a pay to win model. Previously you could achieve anything in the game with a bit of hard work, then they tweaked it and you could achieve anything with a bit of hard work and team work. Sadly though what's happened is soft paywalls have been introduced, things you can't outright buy, but will only manage with financial outlay and change after change is being introduced with new soft paywalls and new ways to try and cash grab. The game is on a steady but rapid downward decline and to any new players I would avoid picking it up and investing your time in it now.

Update: Now it won't even open. Once you find out your progression is rigged, the fun wears off. You will have a win streak going, them "mysteriously" a machine will show up with just the right set up to beat yours. Then once you finally get the right configuration to beat that one (however long that takes) another machine with the perfect set up to beat yours shows up again preventing you from progressing. Over and over and over....

Great game, easy to play and a good time waster. One thing I would like to see in a future update  is a scroll bar for the parts in your garage. It would make it a lot easier than swiping through them, especially for those who have a lot of spare parts like myself. Other than that, awesome game.

This game sucks. First it is really hard to get good equipment. Then it is also very laggy. Everytime im playing the game it freezes right when im doing something. (Mainly when im customizing my car). Think about it when you are getting ths game to take up storage. If you'll excuse me now I've got a game to delete.

comments: MotoG5plus/Ipega9021  Amazing game, better than I remember (original Xbox) No lag what so ever and all graphics are maxed, looks much better than Xbox version. Works great with an Ipega 9021 Bluetooth controller. Loading times are so much better than they were back in the day. Don't miss this definitive version San Andreas! Snapdragon 625/Tegra 4 will easily Max the graphics. Tegra 4 will give around 2 hours of gameplay, SD625 will give around 5 hours of gameplay. It will use around 600 MB of RAM at Max settings if you have it free

i bought this game on my samsung galaxy s4 octa core version and it looks more of lagplay and not gameplay. this is dejecting as rockstar games has failed to optimise this game for android devices. it is recommended that they make necessary improvements and make the game playable for medium to high end devices. i have 4gb internal storage out of 16gb free yet the game lags, even on low settings like 0% resolution and draw distance .

This game is so old school and gta 5 is so much better than this game but it is still worth playing. It has a lot of cheats and hacks but it is still very good. It plays up very x1000000 rare. This game is very fun and if you have seen my comment please download this game immediately because it's extremely fun and it is very easy to collect money ps its okay to play offline and if you have seen my comment i recommend you to download this game immediately and have a great time

I loved this game wh3n I was young and this brings back the best memories of my child hood haha.. the controls are kinda lumpy when steering a vehicle. But all other movements are pretty good. Butt,if you happen to have a Xbox one s controller it works perfect on my galaxy s8 plus. Thanks for porting this game to android and giving the option to max the graphics out. Looks very good! Loving the portal game feel too haha!

Just started, i am playing with an Xbox One controller and everything works perfect.  The only problem is you are stuck with the original controls and cant change the buttons functions.  I wish i could use the triggers for gas and braking for driving the cars like in GTA's 4 and 5.  Other than that everything is good.  A classic game, that runs smoothly, and is a great time nostalgia trip.   This one works so well that i am definitley buying the other ports as soon as i am done with this one.

Game could be grate Game looks awesome but the controls don't work right. Walking and running is not fluid. It's stop and go. While driving it is very hard to steer while pressing the gas pedal. I have Max Payne and the controls in that are great what happened with GTA San Andreas. Please fix. Also could you make it so I can move the game to my SD Card. I am using a Samsung galaxy tab 4.
description: Five years ago, Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas, a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption. Where filmstars and millionaires do their best to avoid the dealers and gangbangers.Now, it’s the early 90’s. Carl’s got to go home. His mother has been murdered, his family has fallen apart and his childhood friends are all heading towards disaster.On his return to the neighborhood, a couple of corrupt cops frame him for homicide. CJ is forced on a journey that takes him across the entire state of San Andreas, to save his family and to take control of the streets.Rockstar Games brings its biggest release to mobile yet with a vast open-world covering the state of San Andreas and its three major cities – Los Santos, San Fierro and Las Venturas – with enhanced visual fidelity and over 70 hours of gameplay.Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas features:  • Remastered, high-resolution graphics built specifically for mobile including lighting enhancements, an enriched color palette and improved character models. • Cloud save support for playing across all your mobile devices for Rockstar Social Club Members.• Dual analog stick controls for full camera and movement control.• Three different control schemes and customizable controls with contextual options to display buttons only when you need them.• Compatible with the MoGa Wireless Game Controllers and select Bluetooth and USB gamepads.• Integrated with Immersion tactile effects.  • Tailor your visual experience with adjustable graphic settings. Languages Supported: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian and Japanese. For optimal performance, we recommend re-booting your device after downloading and closing other applications when playing Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas. For information about supported devices and compatibility, please see:http://support.rockstargames.com/hc/en-us/sections/200251868-San-Andreas-Mobile-SupportMobile Version developed by War Drum Studioswww.wardrumstudios.comFind out more:www.rockstargames.comSee videos:www.youtube.com/rockstargamesFollow us:www.facebook.com/rockstargameswww.twitter.com/rockstargames
descriptionHTML:
Five years ago, Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas, a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption. Where filmstars and millionaires do their best to avoid the dealers and gangbangers.

Now, it’s the early 90’s. Carl’s got to go home. His mother has been murdered, his family has fallen apart and his childhood friends are all heading towards disaster.

On his return to the neighborhood, a couple of corrupt cops frame him for homicide. CJ is forced on a journey that takes him across the entire state of San Andreas, to save his family and to take control of the streets.

Rockstar Games brings its biggest release to mobile yet with a vast open-world covering the state of San Andreas and its three major cities – Los Santos, San Fierro and Las Venturas – with enhanced visual fidelity and over 70 hours of gameplay.

Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas features:
• Remastered, high-resolution graphics built specifically for mobile including lighting enhancements, an enriched color palette and improved character models.
• Cloud save support for playing across all your mobile devices for Rockstar Social Club Members.
• Dual analog stick controls for full camera and movement control.
• Three different control schemes and customizable controls with contextual options to display buttons only when you need them.
• Compatible with the MoGa Wireless Game Controllers and select Bluetooth and USB gamepads.
• Integrated with Immersion tactile effects. 
• Tailor your visual experience with adjustable graphic settings.

Languages Supported: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian and Japanese.

For optimal performance, we recommend re-booting your device after downloading and closing other applications when playing Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas.

For information about supported devices and compatibility, please see:
http://support.rockstargames.com/hc/en-us/sections/200251868-San-Andreas-Mobile-Support

Mobile Version developed by War Drum Studios
www.wardrumstudios.com

Find out more:
www.rockstargames.com

See videos:
www.youtube.com/rockstargames

Follow us:
www.facebook.com/rockstargames
www.twitter.com/rockstargames

descriptionHTML:
FEEL THE RUSH! KRITIKA: The White Knights

* Feel the adrenaline at your fingertips!
- Play the most exhilarating action RPG that will keep you electrified!
- Intense EX skills that jump off the screen! Call upon a friend's Striker to help you dominate!

* Meet the champions!
- Mystic Wolf Guardian: Brilliant lightning skills! The power of Sirius! Enemies watch out, she'll destroy all those in her way!
- Noblia: Dominates the enemies with different weapons and her super strong power!
- Ice Warlock: Powerful frost magic attack sweeps the enemies off the ground!
- Burst Breaker: Sprightly and unpredictable! Single strike will blast the entire battlefield!
- Eclair: Her second to none versatility will lead the enemies to their ruin!
- Blood Demon: Her bloodthirsty spear yearns for lives!
- Demon Blade: His blade cuts a bloody path through the battleground!
- Crimson Assassin: Cool as ice! The battlefield is her playground!
- Dark Valkyrie: She seduces with her chains and judges with her scythe!
- Berserker: Behold his rage as he destroys everything in sight!
- Cat Acrobat: Quick and agile, fall in love with her spunky fighting moves!
- Shadow Mage: His eerie shadow will ensnare and annihilate enemies!

* Experience a game system like no other!
- It's more fun if you work together! Enjoy the new Guild system!
- Pets that keep your side and make you stronger!
- Grow stronger through 103 different stages in Stage Mode!
- Encounter the Monster Wave! Attack an endless wave of monsters!
- Climb and conquer the 50 floors of the Tower of Tribulation!
- Test your skills in Arena, Versus, and Melee! Become the ultimate champion!
- Work together to defeat powerful bosses in "World Boss"!
- Use the Auto-Battle feature to clear stages more conveniently!

* Minimum Device Requirement: Galaxy S3

http://m.gamevilusa.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?512-Kritika-The-White-Knights

PHONE : Authorization is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards. Will not affect calls.
CONTACTS : Authorization is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

** This game is available in English.
** There may be additional costs when trying to obtain certain items.

* GAMEVIL Customer Support : https://m.withhive.com/customer/inquire

comments: The more I play the more this game is broken ... the AI for the troupes constantly suicide even if you keep rallying them , I am lvl 169 and I am constantly getting attacked by lvl 220 and up no lies , I can give screenshots because that is fair ... this is 1-5 times at least per hour ... this game from very fun became very frustrating. The game creators could give 2 sh/ts about what is going on .

My phone is not rooted or jail broken, I do not have any hacks installed. I get a message saying illegal program detected by XIGNCODE3. Even after multiple uninstalls/installs, reboots, cache clears. All that time and energy wasted!!!

This is the game I have been searching for. But can't give 5 star because of 2 main reasons. Consume too many data while playing that required fast network and too many bugs... Problems free=5 stars.. What happen? I cannot even play the game now.. I once install and play and later uninstall because of game problem. Now I install and try to play again. I cannot play.. What is the problem? I also want to recover my account too..

Gameplay and graphics is great BUT as you progress you spend more time upgrading units and buildings. Some upgrades take up to a week of upgrading rendering those villagers useless aswell as the rate at which resources comes in as you collect doesnt compensate enough for the costs of upgrades. Its unnecessarily STRETCHED OUT. because of this its a 3 star rating...DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU HAVE NO PATIENCE. Been playing a year and i dont feel my progress is a representation of the time i have put in. Been playing almost daily!

If you are going to do updates on this game, at least MAKE SURE it isn't lagging! My game since the update has been freezing up and lagging to the point that I select something (a wall for example) and the whole  game freezes and takes a million years just to LOAD. If this game isn't fixed, I'm demanding all my money spent on the game refunded and uninstallment. Not happy.

This is the exact definition of a strategy game, the controls are great and its free. You get to choose your own nation which just adds to the strategy, plus whatever you do in a battle can affect the entire battle. I would recommend it to people who want something with strategy and a bit of hardcoreness. The learning curve is quite steep sometimes.
description: Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!BUILD a unique village of your own design. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.DOMINATIONS FEATURES:GREAT LEADERS!• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!BRAND NEW EVENTS!• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!Download now to start building your civilizationNOTES:A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR
• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!
• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.
• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.
• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.
• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!

Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!

Download now to start building your civilization

NOTES:

A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/

recentChanges: v6.2 Update Notes
- Expand your civilization with 15 new spaces to explore!
- Upgrade your University to level 7!
- Research Haile Selassie’s skill tree at the University to improve your late-game combat defenses.
- Harness the power of his Capstone, Lion of Judah, unlocking the ability to build a Rocket Arsenal to defend your base!
- Town Center now has increased white radius where defenders are triggered.
- Japanese Town Centers features an additional yellow ring to show its firing range.
summary: Battle strategy game: Build an empire, wage war & conquer nations across history
title: DomiNations

description: 'Food Truck Chef' was chosen as one of Google Play’s Best Games of 2017!Cook tons of fabulous cuisines and become a top chef in this addictive time-management food truck cooking game! Download now for free!Travel across the world and spread the Food Truck craze, something a restaurant could never let you do!  Use various ingredients to cook lots of amazing recipes of delicious dishes and desserts like Coffee, Pizza, Sandwich, Cake, BBQ, Burger, French Fries etc… This fun food truck cooking game has more than 150 new ‘n’ tasty dishes and more than 250 levels to play with, and a dash of challenge at every turn. More cuisines being added all the time!Upgrade your kitchen appliances to cook quick and fast. Decorate your truck with awesome upgrades to keep the surroundings cool and fun for everyone.Game Features:• Unlock lots of cool levels with unique dishes and ingredients.• Unlock new items to upgrade your kitchen and be a better chef.• Welcome your customers to your food truck with a new look, customize the look to keep getting more tips!• Chase whacky achievements.• Battle it out against other chefs at the Food Truck Carnival• Play with your friends when you connect to Facebook• Go on a cruise and try your luck at the slot machine!Let’s fire up the grill!‘Food Truck Chef™ : Cooking Game’ is a completely free to play game but some in-game items require payment.We would be happy to hear from you. descriptionHTML:
'Food Truck Chef' was chosen as one of Google Play’s Best Games of 2017!

Cook tons of fabulous cuisines and become a top chef in this addictive time-management food truck cooking game! Download now for free!

Travel across the world and spread the Food Truck craze, something a restaurant could never let you do! Use various ingredients to cook lots of amazing recipes of delicious dishes and desserts like Coffee, Pizza, Sandwich, Cake, BBQ, Burger, French Fries etc…

This fun food truck cooking game has more than 150 new ‘n’ tasty dishes and more than 250 levels to play with, and a dash of challenge at every turn. More cuisines being added all the time!

Upgrade your kitchen appliances to cook quick and fast. Decorate your truck with awesome upgrades to keep the surroundings cool and fun for everyone.

Game Features:
• Unlock lots of cool levels with unique dishes and ingredients.
• Unlock new items to upgrade your kitchen and be a better chef.
• Welcome your customers to your food truck with a new look, customize the look to keep getting more tips!
• Chase whacky achievements.
• Battle it out against other chefs at the Food Truck Carnival
• Play with your friends when you connect to Facebook
• Go on a cruise and try your luck at the slot machine!

Let’s fire up the grill!

‘Food Truck Chef™ : Cooking Game’ is a completely free to play game but some in-game items require payment.

We would be happy to hear from you. Do get in touch with us.
- To know more about the game visit: www.nukeboxstudios.com/foodtruckchefgame
- For feedback/suggestions write to us: support@nukeboxstudios.com
- For latest news, like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/foodtruckchefgame

This game has been conceptualized and developed by Nukebox Studios. Visit us at www.nukeboxstudios.com.

****************************************************************
Game Requirements
****************************************************************
'Food Truck Chef™' respects your privacy, does not store any personal information and does not share this information.

We do require a few additional Permission to function:

- Permission to read & write to external storage
Food Truck Chef™ needs this permission to store your game progress locally on your device.

title: Food Truck Chef™: Cooking Game

Five stars! I don't give good reviews  unless I like the game, with Google play that's becoming kind of rare so having a breath of fresh air like this is truly amazing. One thing that this game just different from just about every other game on Google Play is that it doesn't Force ads on you! Instead it will offer you an add for currency or an extra life, purely by choice not by shoving it down your throat! The art style is so old-school and I love it, not to mention that the wepons are insane!!! I honestly don't have anything bad to say about this, keep up the good work ChillyRoom! :D

Great game! Very addicting as well...  But Multiplayer-wise: This game needs to be more optimized for slower devices in order to avoid Server Crashes/Lags, and also needs to improve on the Multiplayer Connection difficulty... Then last but not least, could you make a SEPARATE Save File for Multiplayer Games? Seriously, it bugs me when my friends and I save a game to continue the next day without being able to play at all unless if I want the Save File to be lost.

description: “In a time of gun and sword, the magical stone that maintains the balance of the world is stolen by high-tech aliens. The world is hanging on a thin thread. It all depends on you retrieving the magical stone…” We honestly can’t keep making it all up. Let’s just shoot some alien minions!This is the game you have always wanted in your subconscious. Explore the dungeon, collect crazy weapons, dodge bullets and shoot‘em all up! Extremely easy and intuitive control; super smooth and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like elements. Best shooter game you will find on the mobile store so far.Features:* Unique heroes, with unique ability.* 170+ weapons waiting for you to explore.* Randomly generated dungeon world, new experience every time.* NPCs that actually matter! descriptionHTML:
“In a time of gun and sword, the magical stone that maintains the balance of the world is stolen by high-tech aliens. The world is hanging on a thin thread. It all depends on you retrieving the magical stone…”

We honestly can’t keep making it all up. Let’s just shoot some alien minions!

This is the game you have always wanted in your subconscious. Explore the dungeon, collect crazy weapons, dodge bullets and shoot‘em all up! Extremely easy and intuitive control; super smooth and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like elements. Best shooter game you will find on the mobile store so far.

Features:
* Unique heroes, with unique ability.
* 170+ weapons waiting for you to explore.
* Randomly generated dungeon world, new experience every time.
* NPCs that actually matter! They will fight by your side!
* Auto-aim mechanism for super intuitive control.
* Many more features that you will find out in game.

Follow Us
Twitter: @ChillyRoom
Facebook: @chillyroomsoulknight

Note:
* To use the screen recording function, permission to write to external storage is required.

Thanks to:
Matthias Bettin, for initial of German localization.
Numa Crozier, for French corrections.
Jun-sik Yang(ladoxy) for Korean corrections
Iván Escalante, for Spanish corrections.
Oliver Twist, for initial of Russian localization.
Почеревин Евгений, Алексей С. and Турусбеков Алихан for additional Russian localization.
Tomasz Bembenik, for initial Polish localization.

comments: This game has gotten somewhat progressively worse over the years. To new players I would not recommend this game. They only want your money and give almost nothing in return. They just took the ability to transfer between devices on the same account unlimited times and reduced it to 3 times per week. This may not seem like a big deal but players rely on this sole game mechanic alone to succeed in events. The devs are just hungry for your money, I love it but I've invested too much, don't subject yourself to this.

Two big parts of what I love about this game are its inclusivity in terms of skin tone and gender representation.   There are four different skin tones available to everybody in every situation. While there are many more variations in reality, it's refreshing to have more options than one.   Some items have gendered words in the their titles, but that doesn't restrict their usage at all. It's possible to mix and match anything and everything, regardless of each item's implied target gender.   I'm not sure if these positive aspects were intended or not, but they make me feel included, which is more than I can say for most games.

The developers lock players (paying players) out of their accounts with sudden announced changes with no notice, thus unable to access all paid content. Also extremely laggy at times, support very slow and emails get ignored. I have spent $3000+ on this game, but not 1 cent more with these new changes.

I love this game. Its very anime like I love anime so this was a very good game for me. But there's one problem I have with the game, why is it mostly you have to buy everything? And the people who don't have money or spend on things, we have to get everything while people who has money gets the nice cool things.

No trade system, Why!?! Plus the reply on boards doesn't notify the person you're replying to; you may want fix that eventually. But that aside this game is great it's very inclusive of plenty of different styles. They are lacking a bit on male items but they've gotten better over the years! It's hard to get a high rank unless you slave over the game but you don't really need the events to get good items.

2/16/18 Could you give us a way to transfer account or change account without installing and unistalling the app?  You did add a 'trading system' however it is not the trading system we want. You only change the name of the 'store'    07/19/17 So many bugs!!!   I like playing this game but it would be better if you allow us to send gifts to other player.  I've seen in the profile of other players that they want you to add trading system.  I think trading system in this game is impossible but please allow us to SEND GIFTS to other players.  3/20/18  The game often have unending loading so I often need to restart the game.
