comments: Fun, easy to play, complex to reach higher levels, this game has, so far, been great. No microtransactions (thus far) to continue playing, which is a huge plus. A few have stated a couple of bugs, which I agree with, adding only one other comment; I do wish their was an offline option for at least some gameplay. Online still necessary for a lot, but offline to run some dungeons. This could, in theory, help with some server space, as well.

This game is one of the best game I ever played in mobile. I love the graphic which is cute and there is so many content, so it's not boring. And another positive side, you can get the special currency easily in the game. It's not a p2w games ^^ but the sign board was one of the best micro transaction I've ever seen. Try it and you'll see.. it's a lot of fun ^^

I've been looking for a game like this for ages! I was a fan of Runestone Keeper and wanted something similar for my phone. These guys knocked it out of the park. I rarely spend money on phone games, but these guys deserve every penny and accolade coming their way. Fun and  simple, yet brilliant in execution and design. Tons of content already, and I can't wait to see what's next. Keep up the great work!

This game is so much fun! My only complaint is that the gear is gone when done with the maze, so you start it over. As well as "learning new titles". It gets kinda old having to start that over every time you beat a full maze. But that aside, this game is definitely addictive! Keep up the great work!

Your game is amazing. You guys are amazing. After everything you went through, you deserve these stars at the very least. Your game isn't pay to win, it's just a grand experience and I love it.  One of the BEST games on the market easily.  Keep up the good work, you're all doing fantastic.  Respect

I've been playing like nine months and it's very addictive you really grow and have many choices. It's truly free to play and gems are everywhere. Buying a signboard for real money is the best bang for your buck and a lizard if you feel like buying something else.  Totally recommend it. I only hate getting creator gumball is so expensive other than that it's a great game. It's a game that goes as fast or as slow as you feel like playing.
description: Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)DESCRIPTIONThis is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.FEATURES● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the gameSUPPORTAre you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.Forums & Guide:English:    https://goo.gl/ecChhsWiki:http://gdmaze.wikia.comTerms of Service:http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.htmlIt's necessary to use the below permissions:RECORD_AUDIOThere is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.The video below shows how it works in the game:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be  GET_ACCOUNTSIn order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.
descriptionHTML:
Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)

DESCRIPTION
This is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.

FEATURES
● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements
● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...
● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.
● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...
● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly
● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the game

SUPPORT
Are you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.

Forums & Guide:
English: https://goo.gl/ecChhs

Wiki:
http://gdmaze.wikia.com

Terms of Service:
http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.html

It's necessary to use the below permissions:

RECORD_AUDIO
There is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.
The video below shows how it works in the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be

GET_ACCOUNTS
In order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.

comments: Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

the graphic, control, and gameplay is good as always, but the problem is, i played this years ago just with a device with 1gb RAM and i have mid-high graphic setting, but now im running with oppo a37f and i think it can run this game with a mid or mid 2 graphic setting... but no, my game always set to the lowest graphic, could you guys fix this problem? i love this game and i'd like to enjoy it in its best performance

It's a great game where you can race and customise your own car. However here are some ideas I would like you the imlament please  1. If the cars from the NASCAR can get the custmizeing like all the others.   2. To extend the custmize can yo add a tab where you can put spoilers, air intakes And other things you would put on a car.  3. Finally to make this game real racing 3 if when a race of just go to see all the car you have.  There be a "i" button that will give the player real information about the car the player is looking at.

descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Over 200 Million Downloads!

TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing Game
Mobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013
Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in Art
Meffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**

PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3
“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice)
“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)
“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.

comments: I love this game. Just like other reviews say, it is addicting and because there are constant tasks to complete. Plus!..unlike other games, there is no way you ruin out of coins/money. The cities bring in alot. I can't agree with one reviewer that megabucks are hard not come by.  I began with 25 I believe (now at 32) and some of the tasks to complete give megabucks without spending actual money to even purchase some.  All in all, try this game and you won't run bored of it.

Best game!! Very addictive, Been playing this game for over a year.. although, there are still alot to improve!  I hope the developers will include edit mode in the next update so that the players can rearrange their city..Also, I hope they will also include a 360 rotation of the city and add factories that can also create materials needed in the game like the railroad materials and steels. I am looking forward with this updates!!

Great, but really needs "sell all" function for dealing with store house and "pecial buildings" components.This is a really quality game, looks amazing, works well and has good timed construction projects. However, as others mention it takes SOOOOOOO long to accrue the assets for construction and the mega bucks for expansion. You have to be VERY patient if you are not willing to part with actual cash. An idea might be to offer a conversion of coins to megabuck, maybe get 1 buck in excahge for eg 5,000,000 coins?

Good game but......after a day into it you make no coin. After every level upgrade it pushes the (buy) equipment option. Not to mention every time you level up. You got to.exit out 15 boxes.before you can continue. Good game but, it's a failure on the free to play aspect.  My rating is fair and final. It's a (ok)  game but many better ones out thwre

The new update is great! Really appreciate the chat system. But it could be better... maybe add some functionality to the capital buildings and states.... maybe bonuses to taxes nd pop, loans, and coop science and military missions. The prices of capital building materials is ridiculous. Fixing these will make the state system look more complete.

Been playing for more than 3 years, i lost count. But this is a wonderful game which encourages teamwork and neighbor support. There are barely any paywalls in this game and  if you have hundreds of facebook friends who have this game you can easily get the materials you need to expand your city. No limits so far. I give ★★★★★s

comments: love it

I find it a little tricky to navigate sometimes, since it makes my on-screen navigation bar disappear. I like it but maybe I would like it more if there was a back arrow? Also the ads are pretty annoying. They randomly pop up, they're always a video, and there's not really any insentive to watch them. But all-in-all, it's a good game. It's pretty entertaining, it isn't very time consuming, and I'd say it's at least worth a try. Thanks for reading

Really disappointed. I played the party game to win the St Patrick's badge. I came 2nd place when it finished and ift said I had won a badge but it doesn't appear in my badge collection. Then I notice that the party game has been extended by another 24 hrs. Now I'm 96th place. That's not fair. I won that badge fair and square can you give it to me, please?

I love this game, but the ads are over the top. Can I pay to make them g away again? I don't know what happened, but I had a paid version with no ads before? I played a few games but the abundance of ads made this a stresser instead of stress relief. 😟

I love the game but HATE the way advertisements are difficult to dismiss. You are forced to view the same annoying ads (mostly for silly bubble popping games)... and sometimes the cancel "x" button is so small it won't close the ad when clicked multiple times. I've been playing this game over 2 years and just had to CLOSE the app because I couldn't dismiss an advertisement.
I haven't been able to change my profile picture since December. I keep getting an error. I thought the most recent update would fix it, but still am not able.

comments: Loved this game. The game is so addictive and enjoyable. I think the best ever football game to come across. BUT I HAVE ONE PROBLEM WITH THIS GAME. AFTER BUYING COMPETITIVE SQUAD THE GAME BECOMES SO EASY SUCH THAT I WIN BY A MARGIN OF 10 GOALS PER GAME. SO KINDLY, KINDLY.. DEVELOP TWO LEAGUES WHERE TO WIN A GAME SOMEONE MUST SWEAT even if you have all players rated 90%.hope for consideration during next update.

There's always a bug when there's about to be substitution of players causing the players in possession of the ball to run like headless chicken. Pls fix that. Add SULLEY MUNTARI of Deportivo La Coruna to the game pls. 'Need FTS18 with embedded dream league soccer ffs! Seems many players who have their current teams in the game are missing. Lawrence Ati of Sochaux in Ligue 1, Joe Dodoo, and many more. A quick update with massive changes will be great 'cause the game currently sucks!!!

DLS is one of the best games on Android. Just need some improvement in training mode, Training is full of bugs. And where is Ball change mode?? Please add new stylish Match Balls. AND PLEASE ADD NEW CELEBRATIONS IN NEW STYLE!! Need more realistic Gameplay. Really hope that you guys fix all small bugs soon. I'll rate 5 Stars!! ❤👏👏

Everything is good. But one thing. I have 6 created players in my team and I don't get new players for 5-6 season. Please make a "Create a Player" option under 'My Club' menu with more player editing options with a base rating of 60 or 70. Please add this feature then only I can create players same as the local leage in my region. It'd be so nice if you add that.

Look what I experienced. Dls needs development. The commentry needs more reasonableness and intelligence. The behaviour of each player, at least the famous ones should be unique. Controls need more improvement. Add real team logos for the opponent teams. Update players team data according to the recent transfers. And one more issue, while playing local multiplayer we need an extra device to connect two phones. This is a bad experience. If we can connect with each other simply by connecting wifi and hotspot of the two phones respectively, it would be great and simple.

It is a brilliant game absolutely loved it. But it cud add something first can it have every player's data like if i bought neymar then can it in records give his number of goals, assists, appearances and second after every player's stats that his pitch map how many interception he did and etc not just motm bur every player

comments: This game is really fun, I love everything about it, specially joining in a clan. But I wish there would be a chance to chat with each member not just smileys but as of now it's super great! Really fun to play, this is the longest time I've ever played such a game in my phone. Absolutely love it!

this game is good till about 8 hours in where your waiting days to build anything. Gems are really hard to come by so you have to be wary about how much stock u have. And there's no way to dispose of unwanted items in your warehouse (that I know of) but yeah, it's a catchy game

Pretty much a money pit. It's designed to frustrate you into spending money. Everything takes stupid amounts of resources to build or expand. The expansions are tiny. It becomes impossible to fill orders because they all want items you can't make because you cant build anything. Caravans usually ask for ridiculous amount of things and you have no storage room. Everything takes too long to make or regrow so even if you have room, the caravan times out. And the rewards for filling them is measly. It'll still take weeks to get enough to defeat monsters that block expansions. Don't download if youre looking for a fun game.

I liked this game, and have played it for months, until a few days ago when I noticed the "price" of buildings required to progress take a huge jump up!! I will gladly support a game I like by making purchases but I'm not about to spend my house payment just to progress IN A GAME!! Not cool, and makes me regret the money Ive spent so far. On to the next!!

Question why do I have to give 30 diamonds for one shield? And Everytime I expand my barn it on expand from 5-10 I need more room then that over then that.. I wake up out my sleep just to play this game. I need more space please and Thank u.
They deleted my whole account out of nowhere!  Everything gone. Don't waste your time. And please dont spend any money. Totally rip off!

Take on real opponents in Online Multiplayer Battles. Compete against players worldwide on the leaderboards, and in tournaments filled with awesome rewards. Watch replays of your previous offensive and defensive battles to hone your skills and your team lineup. Lead your team to victory!

MASSIVE ROSTER
Collect and play as your favorite DC Comics icons: Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, The Joker, Green Arrow, Flash, Bane, Green Lantern, Doomsday, and many others. With each alternate version of these iconic characters you get a new set of powers and moves, and a whole new fight!

AMAZING GRAPHICS
Delivers best-in-class graphics on your phone or tablet, with custom animations for every single super hero and villain. Take the battle to Arkham Asylum, the Batcave, The Watchtower, and other iconic locales from DC Comics, fully rendered in 3D.


Please Note: INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.

"Best Mobile MMO" at E3 2015 in LA"Best Mobile Game" by ComputerBild.de at Gamescom 2015 in Germany"Best Mobile/Tablet Game" at Game Connection 2015 in ParisTorchlight (I/II) series was developed by Runic Games, which is formed by Max Schaefer, the former vice president of Blizzard North and the creator of Diablo games. It’s known as one of the best ARPG games in the world, and the best Diablo-like game since Diablo II.As a faithful interpretation of the PC version, Torchlight Mobile renders the world of stunning 3D graphics with ultimate randomness and freedom, focuses on exploring and conquering different dungeons with epic equipments as well as powerful pets. With a brand-new Skill Combination system and various combat modes, like 1v1, Pets PK, Arena Championship and Guild War, players can create their own series of skills to perform various effects in the damage and defeat epic enemies with styles in Torchlight Mobile.INHERIT THE SPIRIT OF DIABLO SERIES Abundant random attribute, random skills, set attribute, gem effects, legendary equipment attribute enable every equipment to be the unique one in game.UNIQUE SKILL COMBINATION SYSTEMEach role class has 6 main skills, and each 2 of them could be combined to get a combined skill. Players are able to make combination among 36 skills, and get 120 kinds of combined skills. Depending on strategies, players could switch to different combined skills, and enjoy the great fun of various kinds of fight.CLASSIC MAPWORKS RETURNS By composing maps in Mapsworks, random maps and monsters will be created. And depending on the former maps’ attribute, composed maps will have different map effect and influences its monsters and adventure environment.ULTIMATE RANDOMNESS SYSTEM Random stage monsters, random elite monsters, random monster skills, random fishing ponds, random hiding rooms...Numerous of random elements make players feel exciting and keep the game experience fresh.FEATURED PET & FISHING GAMEPLAY Featured and characteristic pets own unique main skills and passive skills, and they can be applied depending on different fight strategies. descriptionHTML:
Fight for Glory in new Cross-Server Guild Combat - Throne War!
To be the dominators of all servers! Players are called to compete with Guilds from different servers for occupying territory. Lead your Guild to win the Throne and great rewards!

"Best Mobile MMO" at E3 2015 in LA
"Best Mobile Game" by ComputerBild.de at Gamescom 2015 in Germany
"Best Mobile/Tablet Game" at Game Connection 2015 in Paris

Torchlight (I/II) series was developed by Runic Games, which is formed by Max Schaefer, the former vice president of Blizzard North and the creator of Diablo games. It’s known as one of the best ARPG games in the world, and the best Diablo-like game since Diablo II.
As a faithful interpretation of the PC version, Torchlight Mobile renders the world of stunning 3D graphics with ultimate randomness and freedom, focuses on exploring and conquering different dungeons with epic equipments as well as powerful pets. With a brand-new Skill Combination system and various combat modes, like 1v1, Pets PK, Arena Championship and Guild War, players can create their own series of skills to perform various effects in the damage and defeat epic enemies with styles in Torchlight Mobile.

INHERIT THE SPIRIT OF DIABLO SERIES
Abundant random attribute, random skills, set attribute, gem effects, legendary equipment attribute enable every equipment to be the unique one in game.

UNIQUE SKILL COMBINATION SYSTEM
Each role class has 6 main skills, and each 2 of them could be combined to get a combined skill. Players are able to make combination among 36 skills, and get 120 kinds of combined skills. Depending on strategies, players could switch to different combined skills, and enjoy the great fun of various kinds of fight.

CLASSIC MAPWORKS RETURNS
By composing maps in Mapsworks, random maps and monsters will be created. And depending on the former maps’ attribute, composed maps will have different map effect and influences its monsters and adventure environment.

ULTIMATE RANDOMNESS SYSTEM
Random stage monsters, random elite monsters, random monster skills, random fishing ponds, random hiding rooms...Numerous of random elements make players feel exciting and keep the game experience fresh.

FEATURED PET & FISHING GAMEPLAY
Featured and characteristic pets own unique main skills and passive skills, and they can be applied depending on different fight strategies. Players can strengthen their pets through fishing and can use two different pets to get various cool combo skills.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TorchlightMobileSEA/
Support: TorchlightCS@efun.com

comments: This game is really fun!! One bug I have found though is when you reset you're ascended points it gives you 20000 back no matter how many ascended points you have. For example I had 2 ascended points put them into damage reset it and got 20000 back. Gotta fix that. Over all it's a really fun game

So far it's a very fun game. The music reminds me of old rpgs, and the random loot reminds me of Diablo. I'm about an hour into grinding and have only been forced to watch one 30 second ad but you have the option to watch a few more for items or perks. No bugs seen yet. I got a little happier when I left the game on and my lil hero's went into the dungeon without me.

Can be very fun but is confusing at some points. For example, while attempting to ascend, you must lose the battle. Capturing beasts is also confusing and im still not sure what they are even used for. Otherwise, great game!

This game gets very complicated very quickly. The game's mechanics of clicking on your character to heal them doesn't work often because the characters move quickly.  If you lock a specific item it still allows you to sell it with no notice. Overall a decent game that has too much to offer up too early.
Auto play ads, and loading message on the screen at all times.  Power ups for sale at all timed.  These are the features that turned me completely away.  You should stay away too.
They say it is fun playing this game, bit to me it's not. Why? The words are so very tiny cant read message written in it. If you let the letters enlarge it i'll give you 5 stars

descriptionHTML:
Enjoy the #1 action tapping incremental flash game, now in an app! Crawl through tough dungeons, create a party of Paladins, Archers and Wizards to battle monsters and tough boss battles for epic loot in an all new style of roguelike RPG. Tap to guide your heroes through dungeons, find and evolve new heroes, capture monsters and collect powerful upgrades. See if your heroes can survive Idle Sword 2, an epic clicker/pet battler and retro RPG all in one.

This is an action clicker game like you’ve never seen. Straight from the intense flash game, you’ll have to battle monsters, sell equipment, upgrade your skills and form a party of mystic Wizards & stalwart Paladins to go deeper into perilous dungeons. Use your God Hand tapping powers to guide your not-so idle heroes to find hidden treasure in a pixel dungeon, making sure your idle heroes have enough gear, health and items to protect them from a certain doom.

Squish giant monsters, capture powerful pets, crawl through deep dungeons, play offline and battle monsters of every kind in this incremental RPG!

Idle Sword 2 Features:

Explore Dungeons
- Use your God Hand tapping powers to guide and assist your heroes in the hunt for rare loot!
- Dungeons cover the land and must be explored by the idle heroes.
- Each pixel dungeon has challenging monsters and even more difficult dungeon boss.
- Engage in tough boss battles to clear the pixel dungeon crawl!
- Explore Dungeons even when you are offline in an epic retro clicker!

Battle Monsters
- Battle monsters to survive and collect great rewards!
- Squish any monster that comes your way.
- Your tap quest isn’t complete until the monster is defeated!
- Evolution! Evolve your monsters to unlock their true power!

Collect Heroes
- Idle heroes are everywhere, you just have to find them.
- Collect and evolve heroes as you explore the world and crawl through dungeons!
- Find Powerful Wizards, Shady Rogues, Holy Paladins and Deadly Necromancers!
- Find hidden treasure, rare gems, legendary loot and customize your heroes with only the finest gear.

Incremental Action
- Play as much or as little as you like!
- Your heroes keep leveling up even when you are offline
- Return to collect the loot and riches your heroes collected while you were away!

Lovers of retro games and incremental clickers won’t be able to put down this idle monster battling RPG. Go on an epic tap quest, explore dungeons to battle monsters and defeat the tough dungeon bosses. You never know what could creep up on your heroes- keep your tapping reflexes sharp in Idle Sword 2! Enjoy it online or offline!

Download now and enjoy the acclaimed flash clicker game in an epic new app! Join over 100,000 pixel players!

Click & Tap in this SUPER TOUGH Dungeon Crawler! Over 100,000 Installs! Aspiring Wizards and Paladins apply today!

Idle Sword 2: Incremental Dungeon Crawling RPG
